GSP33yaatsi_u:734: na hyasau sākṣātpratītabhedanimittaḥ pratāyamānaḥ śilāputrakaśīravyapadeśavadaupacāriko yukta āśriyituṃ mamātmetivat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:737: ato dehavyatirekiṇaḥ cetanasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāccatsaṃbandhini lākṣaṇiko dehe 'haṃśabdaprayogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:738: bāhyaviṣayeṣu parasparaviruddharūpaparimāṇasaṅkhayāsanniveśagrahaṇena vyatirekasya sphaṭatvāt ātmani tādṛśarūpāntarāgrahaṇena dehābhedapratibhāsabhramo 'vivekinām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:743: praṇihitamanasastu jñātṛtayā siddhyantamahamākāramarthamanavayavamidamiti parisphurataḥ sthūlādavayavinaḥ śarīrāt pṛthagaparokṣayantyeva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:744: bhavanti ca - jānāmīti pratyayaḥ śarīraviṣayo na bhavati ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:763: idantvena grahaṇameva hastagehāderiva dehasyātmabhedagrahalakṣaṇaṃ tasyātmatve bādhakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:767: svānyagocaraścedaṃpratyayaḥ ekasya puṃsa ekasminnevārthe na ghaṭata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:776: ayaṃbhāvaḥ - ahamiti svasmai bhāsamānaḥ pratyagarthaḥ svātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:777: svasmā idantvenaṃ bhāsamānaśca parāgarthaḥ para iti svaparavibhāgo hi ahamidaṃbuddhiśabdābhyāmeva nirūpyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:780: pratyaktvenāhamiti bhāsamānasyaiva svātmanoḥ daṇḍitvenedamiti bhānaṃ syāddaṇḍyayamitītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:800: trasareṇorniravayavatvānna tadgrūhaṇe niruktaniyamasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:807: avayavipratyakṣatvavyāpakatvasyāvayavabhāne svīkāre bādhakopalambho hi bāhyatatpratyakṣamātraviṣayakatayā niyamasaṅkoce mānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:809: nanu manasā kevalamavayavi gṛhyate vināvayavamityata eva niyamaḥ saṅkocanīya iti cettatrāha 'antakaraṇasye'ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:810: advārīkṛtabahirindriyasya manasaḥ kevale 'vayavaviśeṣṭa vā śarīrādau bāhyārthe grahaṇapravṛtterasaṃbhavāccetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:812: ato na manasā śarīrasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭeta kevalena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:813: caitanyavattvena tasyābāhyatvānmanasā grahaṇaṃ bavedvināvayaveneti tu na kalpanīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:816: rūpādimadavayavipratyakṣasya tadavayavagocaratvamiti niyame naiva doṣaḥ nīrūpatvādvāyoḥ sparśavattvamātreṇa tasya spārśanopagame 'pīti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:825: sthūlo 'haṃ jānāmītyahaṃpratyayo dehadvārā sthaulyānvitāntarātmagocara eveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:830: apṛthaksiddhaprakāravācināṃ ca niṣkarṣakabhinnānāṃ śabdānāṃ dharmiṇi mukhyavṛtterupagamāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:833: mamedaṃ śarīramiti bhedavyapadeśasya śilāputrakasya śarīramitivadaupacārikatvamastvityāśaṅkāṃ vyudasyati 'na hyasā'viti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:844: ahaṃ gacchāmītyādāvahaṃśabda ātmavati dehe lākṣaṇika iti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:845: dehātmabhramavatāṃ tu śaktibhramamūlastathā prayoga iti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:846: evaṃ tarkabalādahaṃ jānāmīti mānasapratyakṣasya sāvayavadehavyatiriktātmaparatvaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:847: evaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano bhāne sati kathaṃ dehābhedabhrama udetītyatrāha 'bāhye'ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:859: bādhakasya bhedakakāragrahasyābhāvamupapādya aikyabhrame sādhakaṃ sādṛśyajñānaṃ copapādayati itaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:861: abhyūha ti iti upasargādasyatyūhyorveti vācya siti vārtikeṇa vaikalpikaṃ parasmaipadam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:874: avahitamanaso niruktaparāmarśavataśca manasā dehavailakṣaṇyenātmanaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:876: evamahaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣasya dehātiriktātmaviṣayatvaṃ tarkabalena vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:877: idameva prayogārūḍhaṃ pradarśayati bhavanti ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:895: saṅghātā hi sarve parārthā dṛṣṭāḥ śayanāsanarathādayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:896: na ca saṅghātāḥ saṃhataśarīrādyarthā dṛśyanta ityātmano 'pi saṃhatatvamāpadyata iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:903: na ca saṅghātasya parārthatve parasya saṃhatatvamapi prayojakam ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:906: śarīrapakṣakānātmatvasādhakaprayoge tṛtīyaṃ saṅghātatvarūpaṃ hetumupakṣipati kiṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:920: ātmatvāparārthatvayoḥ parārthatvānātmatvayośca vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ śloke pūrvārdhoktaṃ vivṛṇoti sarvasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:928: saṅghātaparasya saṃhatatvadṛṣṭeḥ śarīraparatvenānumitasyā'tmano 'pi saṅghātatvaṃ syādityāśaṅkāmanūdya pratikṣipati na ca saṅgātā iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:930: ātmā saṅghātarūpaṃ saṃhataparatvādityanumāne pratitarko 'tra vivakṣitaḥ ātmā yadi saṅgātaḥ syāttarhiparārthaḥ syāditi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:931: ātmā na saṅghātaḥ aparārthatvāditi pratyanumānaṃ vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:933: yadvā anumānabalātprasaktamapi saṅghātatvamātmanaḥ pramāṇāntaraviṣayīkārato nivartsyatītyāha yogyānupalambhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:937: yatra pakṣe sādhyābhāvaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa niścitaḥ tatra vahneranuṣṇatvānumāna iva pakṣabhinnatvasyopādhitvasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:938: prakṛte 'pi śarīrātmavādināṃ tadatiriktātmavādināṃ vā saṃhataparārthatvābhāva evopeyate śarīrasyeti tadbhinnatvasyopādhitve na doṣa ityabhimatam
GSP33yaatsi_u:947: saṅghātatvasya parārthatvena vyāptau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ vyavasthāyāṃ saṃbhavatyāṃ saṃhataparārthatvena tasya vyāpterāśrayaṇamanavasthāprayojakatvānna yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:950: khaṭvādau tathā darśanādityata āha na ca saṅghātasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:952: śeṣitvalakṣaṇaṃ paratvaṃ -prādhānyaṃ saṃbhavatīti parārthatvaniyamasya saṅgāta upapatteḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:955: sapakṣe darśanamātreṇa vyāptyanupayogi-sarvagharmoparāgeṇa sādhyasya pakṣe 'numāne 'numānāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgaśvetyāha vyāptyanupayogino 'pī ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:962: evamahaṃ jānāmītyāderahaṃpratyayasya pratyakṣarūpasya dehātiriktaviṣayatvaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ tarkeṇa /
GSP33yaatsi_u:963: tathā cāhaṃpratyaya eva dehabhedapratyayarūpa itīdaṅkāragocare dehe ātmabhedo 'pi pratyakṣasiddha ityavarṇi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:966: sarva eva kāryadravyagataviśeṣaguṇaḥ kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka iti kathamatatpūrvakaḥ śarīre caitanyaguṇaḥ saṃbhavet? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:967: yattu bārhaspatya vacanam - pṛthivyāpastejo vāyuriti tattvāni,
GSP33yaatsi_u:972: sarvadravyeṣu tattatkāryasamadhigabhyaḥ tatpratiyogī śaktayākhyo guṇaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:979: naca śarīrāvayaveṣu pratyekaṃ caitanyaguṇaḥ prajñāyate pratijñāyate vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:983: yattu- akāraṇaguṇapūrvakaṃ citrarūpaṃ paṭe iti ; tanna /
GSP33yaatsi_u:985: sā ca nānārūpaiḥ tantubhiḥ kriyata iti kimanupapannamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:986: pratyekamavidyamānamapi taccitrarūpaṃ tantuṣu saṃhateṣu dṛśyata eva citrā ime tantava iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:992: sa tu rūpaireva kāraṇagatairnānāvidhairārabhyata iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:997: api ca dṛḍha eva śarīre virodhiguṇāpātamantareṇa kusumavilepanagandha iva nivartamānaḥ caitanyasukhādirna tadguṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1001: na ca tathā jñānādiriti nāso tadguṇaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1002: atha deha ātmabhedasyāpratyakṣatve 'pi tasyānātmatvamacetanatvalakṣaṇamanu- mānāt setsyatītyāha asphuṭatve 'pī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1011: tadguṇāntare tyatra tadruṇa ityatra ca tacchabdena śarīrasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:1013: śarīre jñānaguṇasyotpatterayogāccharīraviśeṣaguṇāntaravaidharmyācca na jñānaṃ śarīraviśeṣaguṇa iti kārikārthaḥ //6//
GSP33yaatsi_u:1014: śarīre jñānasyāsaṃbhavaṃ tāvadupapādayati sarva eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1018: bhāve vā ekasminneva dehe 'nekacetanaprasaṅgāt na kāraṇaguṇapūrvakaṃ śarīre caitanyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1023: dṛśyatattatkāryeṇānumeyaḥ tatprati- yogī- tattatkāryeṇa nirūpyasvarūpaḥ prayojakatvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:1024: śaktayākhyo guṇaḥ sarvasminnapi dravye tattatkāryapratiniyato 'stīti ca śaktyaḥ sarvabhāvānāmacintyajñānagocarāḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1041: vāyoḥ spārśanopagame vā vāyau vyabhicāravāraṇāya ekavidhapratyakṣagrāhyajātīyaguṇatvāditi vaktavyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1042: guṇatvapraveśe ca kāryatve satīti cintyaprayojanamiti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1043: viśeṣaguṇalakṣaṇe ca jñānādibhinnatvaṃ na dātuṃ śakyaṃ jñānāderviśeṣaguṇatve prāmāṇike satīti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1046: nanu rasaviśeṣo gandhaviśeṣo vā mādako madaśabdavācyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1047: sa ca viśeṣaguṇo na kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka iti kāryadravyaviseṣaguṇasya kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvaniyamo durvaca ityatrā'ha dravyādīnā mīti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1048: kiṇvādīnāṃ sammardanādināvdyaṇukaparyantanāśe svatantraiḥ paramāṇubhirdravyāntarāvayavasaṃśleṣajanitamadairārabdhe surādravye kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka eva guṇa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1054: dehāvayaveṣu caitanye sādhakābhāvamuktvā bādhakamapyāha tadupagama iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1057: teṣāmeva cetanatve tu parasparāniyamyatayā parasparavārtānabhijñatayā ca vyavahāravisaṃvādaḥ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1059: yamadrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmītyādipratisandhānasya tanmūlavyavahārasya ca vilopaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1063: vijātīyarūpeṣu tantuṣu saṃhateṣu citrapratītimāha pratyekam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1070: laukikaviṣayatayā dravyacākṣuṣe sāmānādhikaraṇyena mahattvaviśiṣṭodbhūtarūpasya samavāyena hetutvasaṃbhave hetutāvacchedakakoṭau vyāpyavṛttitvaviśeṣaṇe prayojanābhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1071: tathā ca citrapaṭasya na cākṣuṣatvānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1074: tantugatavividharūpaiḥ paṭe citrarūpārambhavadavayavagatairanudbhūtacaitanyairdehe udbhūtacaitanyārambho 'stviti ca na śaṅkyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1079: jñānasyeva sukhāderapi viśeṣaguṇasya na śarīradharmatvasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1081: atha tadguṇāntaravaidharmyā dityetadvivṛṇoti api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1085: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- agnisaṃyogena rūpaparāvṛttāvapi tadaprasaṅge rūpasya yāvaddravyabhāvitvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1091: svātmamātragrāhyatvaṃ manomātragrāhyatvaṃ ca jñānādeḥ śarīraviśeṣaguṇāntaravaidharmyamiti phalitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1094: atra prayogaḥ-jñānaṃ na śarīraviśeṣaguṇaḥ ayāvaddravyabhāvitvānmanomātragrāhyatvādvā yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā rūpādīti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1095: evaṃ jñānasya śarīradharmatvābhāvasādhanena śarīrasyātmatvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1110: tavdyāpāraphalaṃ ca jñānaṃ tadgāmi yuktaṃ snānādhyayanādiphalavat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1120: na hi pañcabhirindriyaiḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ vastvanubhūyate 'nusandhīyate vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1122: indriyacaitanye ca tattadindriyāpāye tattadindriyārthasmaraṇamapi na bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1125: anyathā ca praṣṭurmṛtyupapattiṃ śaraṇāgataparityāgasya nṛśaṃsatāṃ cā'locya satyatapasastathā vacanam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1128: tathā sati hi pūrvoktā doṣāḥ parihṛtā bhavanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1137: bāhyendriyeṣu yathāyathaṃ nijaviṣayasannikarṣabhāgiṣvapi yato na yugapadeva sarve viṣayāḥ pratīyante,
GSP33yaatsi_u:1146: tadevaṃ jñānakaraṇatayāvagatasya manasaḥ kathamiva jñāne kartṛtvam ?/
GSP33yaatsi_u:1150: karaṇatvaṃ tu parādhiṣṭhānādhīnavyāpāratārūpapāra tantryaniyataṃ sādhakatamatvamiti kathamivaikatra manasi parasparaviruddha tadubhayadharmasaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyemahi ? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1151: atha tadapi manaḥ karaṇāntareṇa smaraṇādiṣu kartṛbhāvamanubhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:1153: ya eva hi cakṣurādibhī rūpādin āntarakaraṇena ca sukhādīṃścetayate, sa evā'tmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1170: yāvadanubhūtasakalaviṣayasusmūrṣayā sarvataḥ pratyāhṛtacetasaḥ sādhāraṇyena praṇidadhayo 'pi na sarva evārthāḥ smṛtimadhirohanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1173: ātmanaḥ ; tathā sati bahirindriyeṣu ca yathā
GSP33yaatsi_u:1174: yathaṃ svaviṣayasaṃprayukteṣu tathaiva yugapajjñānānutpattirupapadyata iti kṛtamindriyāntareṇa /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1182: prayatna eva tvadṛṣṭasyāpīti nātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādīnāmasamavāyikāraṇasāpekṣatayāpi dravyāntaraparikalpanaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1188: iha vā tahri kiṃ na dṛśyate iṣṭāniṣṭaprāptyavagamānantaraṃ sukhādirjāyata iti ?/
GSP33yaatsi_u:1191: ataḥ prasiddhakāraṇabhāveṣveva yatra kāryasamavāyaḥ tat samavāyikāraṇam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:1199: sa tarhi sparśavaddravyasamaveto bhautika eva copalabdha iti prasiddhadehādisaṃyoga evānumānaparyavasānānna navama
GSP33yaatsi_u:1216: yathā'mnāyate annamayaṃ hi somya mana iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1220: darśitaṃ hi tatraivāṣṭame manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate mano 'sya daivaṃ cakṣuriti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1221: tathā parasyāśca devatāyāḥ so 'nyaṃ kāmaṃ manasā dhyāyīteti mahopaniṣadi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1229: ata eva hi buddhimān manasvīti vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1232: evaṃ ca manasaḥ karaṇatayā vyapadeśo buddhyahaṅkārayoriva vṛttibhedapradarśanaparaḥ pūrveṣāmiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1242: itarathā paramamahato mahataśca sparśavirahiṇaḥ parispandānupapatterutkrāntigatyāgatiśrutayo bhāktāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1250: sa ca kaṇṭhamukhanāsābhyantare bahiśca recitaḥ tvacā spṛśyamāno ghaṭādiriva sphuṭamanātmatayā cakāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1251: atraiva sādhye sādhanāntarāṇi cāha utpattimattvā dityādikārikādvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1260: etadvādhitatvamāha dehe ātmatvaṃ sādhayatāṃ kevalavyatikeriṇām evam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1266: nātra pakṣe prasajyanta ityāha na ca tānī tyādivākyadvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1271: yathā snānādhyayanādivyāpāraphalaṃ śaucākṣararāśigrahaṇādi snātradhyetṛsamavetamiti prayogo bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1276: indriyātmatve 'numānamuktvā'ptavākyamapi saṃvādarūpaṃ nirdiśati ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1281: pratyekendriyacaitanyapakṣe nānāsvāmika iva grāma ekasminneva dehe nānācetanādhiṣṭānānnityakalahādi prasajyate iti dūṣaṇaṃ hṛdi nādhāya dūṣaṇāntaramāha indriyāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1288: tathā hi - saṅghāto yadi saṃyogo bahutvasaṅkhyā vā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:1291: tadāpi na bahūnāmindriyāṇāṃ cākṣuṣāśrayatā spārśanāśrayatā vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1294: saṅghātasya tāvataiva vinaṣṭatvānnirātmakatvena dehasya maraṇaprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1301: atha tatsādhakamanumānaṃ dūṣayati na ca tavyadyāpāre ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1305: atha satyatapaso vacanaṃ karaṇe kartṛtvopacāreṇa pravṛttamanyaparaṃ nendriyacaitanye pramāṇamityāha anyathā ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1306: svāśramapraviṣṭavanamṛgānveṣaṇapravṛttavyādhakṛtapraśrottararūpaṃ satyatapaso vacanam draṣṭuścakṣuṣo nāsti jihvā ityādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1307: etasminnarthe śloko 'yamanugṛhīto 'smadgurucaraṇaiḥ yā paśyati na sā brūte sā na paśyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1308: dṛṣṭirvakti kathaṃ vyādha vāṇī vā vīkṣate katham //
GSP33yaatsi_u:1312: kathane ca śaraṇāgataparityāganibandhanaṃ mahatpāpaṃ paryālocya evaṃ
