GSP33yaatsi_u:2401: dehendriyamanaḥprāṇavijñānebhyo jñānāśrayatayā vivicyamāne pratīpamañcatīva nirbhāsamāno 'haṃbhāva eva hi pratyaktvaṃ nāma /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2404: sarvaṃ ca prakāśamānaṃ jñātre 'hamiti cakāsate prakāśata iti pratyātmasiddho 'yamanubhavaḥ- ahaṃ jānāmi,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2411: na ca jñātṛtvaṃ citāvapi te vāstavamasti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2412: yenāgnisaṃparkādayaḥ piṇḍa ivauṣṇyaṃ tatsaṃparkādarthāntare jñātṛtvaṃ jāyeta jñāyeta vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2418: ata eva khalu ahamullekhavigame suṣuptimuktayoḥ svābhāvikaviśadānubhavamātrarūpeṇā'tmanaḥ prakāśaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2424: prakārāntareṇāpi saṃvidaḥ sadharmakatvaṃ sādhayati siddhiśce diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2427: tadanupagame tu śaśaviṣāṇādivadaprakāśamānāyā asiddhyantyāstasyāstucchatvameva prasajyata iti kārikārthaḥ //10//
GSP33yaatsi_u:2433: saviśeṣatvaprasaṅgādbhītaḥ para āha na kasyaci diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2435: prakāśo hi dharmo vinā dharmiṇā na ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2436: siddheḥ sasaṃbandhikatvaṃ vyutpādayati sā hī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2442: evaṃ cet sadharmatvamāyātyeva saṃvida ityāha ka iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2443: pitaraṃ prati putrasya putratvamivātmapratiyogikaḥ prakāśo dharmaḥ saṃvidātmanaḥ sidhyatītyarthaḥ / evaṃ kāri
GSP33yaatsi_u:2445: evaṃ saṃvido nirviśeṣatvaṃ nirasya nirviśeṣasaṃvidi vedāntatātparyavarṇanaṃ vedāntānāmaprāmāṇyapraryavasāyītyāha tadevam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2448: kṣaṇikavijñānātmavāde smaraṇādyanupapattyā niraste hi nityavijñānātmavādina utthānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2459: tadevaṃ pratisandhānabalājjñāturevātmatvaṃ na jñānamātrasyeti sthita hṛdi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2470: anyatrānyadharmārope cāropyadharmavatā tathā bhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śaṅkhaḥ pītavān,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2473: na caivamatrānubhūtirahamiti vā ahaṃvatīti vā bhānamasti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2475: ahamarthe saṃvidāropopagamastu na ghaṭate pareṣāṃ satyālambanatvaniyamādāropasya,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2479: ahandaṇḍīti pratītitulyatvādahaṃ jānāmīti pratīterahamarthe jñānadharmavattāvagāhitvameveti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2483: yathā daṇḍī puruṣa ityatra daṇḍamātrasya satyatvaṃ puruṣasyāropitatvaṃ ca na,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2484: evamahaṃ jānāmītyatrāpi na jñānamātrasya satstvaṃ jñāturmithyātvaṃ ca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2490: nedamadhyastatvasādhakaṃ bādhitatvena sopādhikatvādityāśayamantarnidhāya pratibandīmāha nanvātmataye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2491: dehātmabhramavatāgṛhyamāṇāyā api saṃvido 'bādhyatvānna mithyātvamiti samādhiṃ vācayati pūrvapakṣimukhataḥ tattvajñānodayā diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2492: tulyamidaṃ jñātṛtvasyānadhyastatvaṃ ityāha kiṃ bho riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2494: mokṣe jñātṛtvasya nivṛttāvanarthaṃ prasañjayati hantaivam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2495: duḥkhanivṛttyā mukteḥ pumarthatvamiti cedānandānubhavanivṛttyānubhavitrahamarthanivṛttyā cāpumarthatvaṃ prasajyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2496: jñātṛtvāderanātmadharmatvāttannivṛttāvapi na pumarthatopaghāto mukteriti śaṅkate nanu jñātṛtvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2499: tanniṣṭhameva jñātṛtvaṃ jñānātmanā pariṇāmalakṣaṇaṃ vikriyātmakaṃ jaḍapariṇāmatvājjaḍaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2507: ātmatvādananyārthatvādajaḍatvādavikriyatvādvā tannaivaṃ yannaivaṃ yathā deha iti prayogā atra garbhitāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2511: jñātṛvyatiriktasya prakāśamātrasyātmano 'nupalambhabādhamuktvā pratyaktvabalādevāhamarthatvamātmana eṣitavyamityāha dehendriye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2524: sarvaṃ ca jñeyaṃ jñātnātmana eva bhāsate na jñānamātnāya/
GSP33yaatsi_u:2525: tataśca jñāturevātmatvaṃ na jñānamātnasyetyāha sarvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2528: kintu jñātureveti tasyaivātmatvaṃ na jñānamātnasyeti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2530: na hi kāpilamata iva jñānapariṇāmitvaṃ jñātṛtvamiṣyate śrutyantahārdābhijñaiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2538: śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari kartāśāstrārthavattvā diti hi vedavedāntahārdābhijñāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2547: evamātmana eva jñātṛtvamahaṃ tvaṃ ca mukhyamityuktvā prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣe buddhyākhye mahattatve tatkārye 'haṅkāre vā jñātṛtvamanupapannamityāha na cāvyākṛte ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2551: mahānahaṅkāro vā na jñātā anātmatvāt pariṇāmitvājjaḍatvātparārthatvādvā dehavaditi prayogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2552: nanu jñātṛtvasyāsaṃbhave 'pi cicchāyāpatyā citsaṃparkādvā tatna jñātṛtvapratītirastvityatnāha naca citī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2556: yena tatsaṃparkāttatna jñātṛtvaṃ tatpratibhānaṃ vā bhavet agnisaṅgādayasi auṣṇyabhānavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2557: sāṃsargiko guṇo doṣo vā tatna tatna jāyate jñāyate ceti jāyeta jñāyeta vetyuktiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2558: atha jñātṛtvapratīternirvāhāya parābhimatamahaṅkārasya saṃvidabhivyañjakatvapakṣa- manuvadati yadyucyete tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2569: na tvātmana ityāha ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2571: ata eva caitanyamātratayā'tmanaḥ svāpemuktau ca bhānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2593: na khalu sarvaṃ sādhayataḥ svataḥsiddhasya ca sadānubhavātmanaḥ prakāśakāntarāpekṣā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2600: tathābhūtāśca dinakaramarīcayaḥ sphuṭamupalabhyanta iti na karatalavyaṅgyatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2610: sa hi vedyagatajñānodayapratibandhakāpanayanena vā dīpeneva santamasanirasanena cakṣuṣaḥ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:2614: ajñānaṃ tu jñānasamānāśrayaviṣayatayā na tadubhayabhāvavirahiṇi bhavadabhimatasākṣiṇi nikṣepamarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2616: tathaiva na jātucit jñātṛtvaṃ jñānamātrasyeti na tasyāpyajñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2621: na ca tadviṣayatvamātmatayābhimata syānubhavasyeṣyata iti tatratyamajñānaṃ na kenacitkadāciducchidyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2622: jñānaprāgabhāvarūpaṃ cājñānaṃ na jñānotpattipratibandhakamiti śakyaṃ vyapadeṣṭum /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2631: niyamena tadvyaṅgyasvarūpasya tadvyañjakatvaṃ hi viruddhamiti proktam/
GSP33yaatsi_u:2633: mithyāpadārthasya pratibhāsādhīnasattākasya pratibhāsābhāve sattāyā eva dirlabhatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2637: tathā cānyonyāśrayaḥ-saṃvitprakāśādhīno 'haṅkāraprakāśaḥ ahaṅkāraprakāśādhīnaśca saṃvidaḥ prakāśa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2638: uktalakṣaṇātprātikūlyādvādhakopanipātānna mitho vyaṅgyavyañjakatvaṃ saṃvidahaṅkārayoḥ saṃbhavatīti ca tātparyāntaraṃ varṇitaṃ śrīmannigamāntagurucaraṇaistattvaṭīkāyām
GSP33yaatsi_u:2644: saṃhatānāṃ ca teṣāṃ sphuṭaprakāśaḥ svata evetyāha karatalasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2647: abhivyaktiprakārāṇāṃ saṃbhāvitānāṃ prakṛte 'nupapatterapi nāhaṅkārasya tadabhivyañjakatvamityāha api ce tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2650: saṃvido jñānāntarāgocaratvena tadviṣayakajñānajanakatvamapi tadabhivyañjakatvamahaṅkārasya neti prakāśanaprakāśakajñānajanakatvarūpābhivyañjakatvaprakāradvayaṃ dūṣitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2654: tadanugrahaprakārāḥ prakṛte na saṃbhavantīti vadan anugrahaṃ vikalpayatitāvat sa hī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2665: niṣkāmakarmaṇā śamādinācāpākṛtapāparāgādidoṣasya śuddhacittasyaiva hi śāstreṇa tattvajñānotpattiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2667: nanvajñānameva jñānotpattivirodhi vedye 'nubhavātmani vartata iti cettatrāha ajñānam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2673: ajñānaṃ hi jñānaprāgabhāvarūpaṃ tatsamānayogakṣemaṃ vānyat jñātṛtvaprasaktiśūnye bhavadabhimate 'nubhavātmani na ghaṭate ghaṭādāviveti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2676: parābhimate 'nubhavātmani ajñānasyopagame 'niṣṭaṃ cāha jñānaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2703: tathā sati sarvasyāpi pratyakṣāderaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgānna kiñcittathyaṃ syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2711: yadi paraṃ parāgarthānanubhavāttamoguṇābhibhavācca na vivicya sphuṭaṃ cakāsti;
GSP33yaatsi_u:2712: bhavadabhimatānubhūtirapi tadānīṃ tathaiva hi prathata iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2714: api tvanubhūtimātramajñānasākṣitayāvatiṣṭhata ityevaṃvidhaṃ svāpasamayabhavamanubhavaṃ nahi suptotthitaḥ kaścit parāmṛśannupalabdhacaraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2715: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ na kiñcidahamavediṣamiti parāmarśanādeva tathātvaṃ labhyata iti cet; kathamiva?
GSP33yaatsi_u:2718: api ca suṣuptisamayasiddhamātmānamahamiti parāmṛśya na kiñcidavediṣaṃmiti tasya vedane pratiṣidhyamāne tātkālikīṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2719: vittisiddhimahamarthasya cāsiddhimabhidadhāno 'nubhavavirodhamapi na jānāti devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2721: nanu māmapyahaṃ na jñātavān prasupta ityasti hi prabodhe pratyayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2722: satyam; sa tu varṇāśramādiviśiṣṭatayā prabodhasamayasaṃvedyamānaṃ dehinaṃ māmityādāya
GSP33yaatsi_u:2725: evamiva khalvayamanubhavaḥ-atra supto 'hamīdṛśaścetyevaṃ māmapi na jñātavānahamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2726: api ca, ātmā suṣuptau ajñānasākṣitvenā'sta iti hi yauṣmākī sthitiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2728: sa cāyaṃ jānāmīti pratibhāsamāno 'smadartha eveti kathamiva tadānīmahamartho na pratheta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2733: yatastathā sati vaināśikadarśana ivātmanāśa evāpavargaḥ prakārāntareṇa pratijñātaḥ syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2737: jñānamapi hi taddharmatvena tasyaiva prakāśate jñānaṃ me jātamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2739: anyaśca-yaḥ sāṃsārikaduḥkhaiḥ duḥkhitvenā'tmānaṃ tattvatobhrāntyā vā pratyeti duḥkhyahamiti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2740: saḥ sarvamidamaniṣṭajātaṃ kathamahamapunarūdayapanudyāvyākulaḥ svastho bhūyāsamiti sañjātamumukṣaḥ tatsādhane pravartate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2743: tataścāsambhavadadhikāritayā sarva eva vedāntavidhayaḥ sarvāṇi ca mokṣaśāstrāṇi prāmāṇyādeva pracyaveran /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2745: na hi mayi naṣṭe 'pi ko 'pi prakāśaḥ sthāsyatīti kaścitprekṣāvān prayasyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2747: asmatpratyaye yo 'nidamaṃśaḥ cidekarasaḥ prakāśaḥ sa ātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2748: tasmiṃstadbalanirbhāsitatayā lakṣaṇato yuṣmadartha evāhaṃ jānāmīti sidhyannartha
GSP33yaatsi_u:2750: ahaṃ jānāmīti sidhyaścetano suṣmadartha iti mātā bandhyetivadvyāhatārthaṃvacaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2757: yo yaḥ svasmai prakāśate sa sarvo 'hamityeva prakāśamānodṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2759: yaḥ punarahamiti na cakāsti nāsau svasmai prakāśate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2769: śrayate hi 'taddhaitatpaśyan ṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipede ahaṃ manurabhavaṃ suryaśca ahameva ca vartāmi bhaviṣyāmī'tyādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2771: prajñāyate 'hantāhamimāstistro devatāḥ' 'bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' 'sar ikṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti',
GSP33yaatsi_u:2775: evaṃ ca sākṣādahamarthādātmano vilakṣaṇe 'pi dehe yenā'vyaktikapariṇāmabhedenāhamiti bhramaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2777: bahumantavyajanāvadhīraṇahetuścāsau garvāparaparyāyaḥ tatra tatra śāstreṣu prāyaśoheyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2779: anātmani tu śarīre bhavantī avidyeti yuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2790: svagatakalmaṣasya svenaiva kevalena nivartanāyogānna tṛtīyo 'pi kalpaḥ kalpata ityarthaḥ //13//
GSP33yaatsi_u:2791: evaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nirasya parābhimataṃ vyañjakasvabhāvamapi nirasyati nace ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2792: pradīpo hi ghaṭādeḥ prakāśako na svavṛttitayā taṃ prakāśayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2793: na khalvevaṃ pratītiḥ pradīpe ghaṭa iti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2795: kintu yathāvasthitaveṣeṇaiva bhūtale ghaṭa itīti bhavadukte niyame 'naikāntyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2798: jñānasāmagrīprayojyatvaṃ jñānabhāsakasāmagrībhāsyatvaṃ ca prāmāṇyasyotpattau jñaptau ca svatastvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2804: anyathā tu jāte 'pi prāmāṇyaniścaye 'prāmāṇyaśaṅkā nirargalaprasarā bhavedeva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2812: darpaṇādi pratihatagateścākṣuṣatejasaḥ pratinivṛtya mukhābhimukhatayā prasaraṇameva mukhasyānyathāpratītau doṣarūpaṃ prayojakam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2818: pramāṇādhīnapramitāvahamarthasyāpi hetutvāt pramāṇadoṣasaṃpādakatve tasya na kiñcidapi yathārthajñānaṃ saṃbhavetpramāṇajanyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2824: atha svāpe muktau cāhamarthasya bhānaṃ nāsti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2825: tannāhamarthasyātmatvaṃ yuktamiti paramatamanūdya nirasyati yattu suṣuptī tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2834: tattatparāgarthānubhavitṛtvena sphuṭaṃ jñānajñeyato vivicyā'tmano bhānaṃ svāpe nāstīti paraṃ yadyucyetetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2838: viśadabhānābhāve 'pi sūkṣmatayāhamarthasya bhānaṃ parābhimatasaṃvida iva svāpe 'stīti ca hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2848: kiñcidityahamarthasyevāsaṅkocātsaṃvido 'pi kroḍīkārāt saṃvinmātrasyāpi bhānaṃ bhavatāṃ tadābhimataṃ na siddhyedityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2849: nanu kiñciditi jaḍamātrasya parāmarśa iti cettarhyahamarthasyāpi na niṣedhaḥ pratyaktvenājaḍatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2850: yadvā jñeyamātrasya kiñciditi parāmarśo na jñānasyeti cettulyanayena jñāturapi na parāmarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2855: na hi bhūtale ghaṭo nāstītyasya ghaṭasadbhāvabhūtalaniṣedhaviṣayakatvaṃ kasyacinmatam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2858: nanu saviṣayasaṃvinniṣedhe 'pi nirviśeṣasaṃvitprakāśe na virodha ityatrāha nirviṣaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2860: tacca dharmabhūtaṃ naiva tadā prakāśata iti tu siddhāntinaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2861: svāpe 'hamarthānanubhave pratisandhānāntaraṃ pramāṇatvena śaṅkate nanu mām iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2873: ajñānasākṣitvenā'tmā svāpe prakāśata iti parapakṣarītyāpi tadāhamarthasya bhānamavarjanīyamityāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2877: to 'hamartha eveti ahamajña ityajñānasākṣitayā svāpe 'hamarthabhānaṃ setsyatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2890: ahamarthasya dharmamātratve tannivṛttāvapi muktau ātmā anuvartate iti bhavatkathanaṃ sādhīyo bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2894: dharmatayā pramīyamāṇasya jñānasya na svatantrātmatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2895: antaraṅgasya jñānasyaivā'tmatvāsambhave bahiraṅgasyendriyādeḥ sutarāṃ na sambhāvitamātmatvamityāha kā kathe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2896: jñātṛtayā pramīyamāṇādahamarthādanyasya na kasyāpyātmatvaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2899: sa cet svasyaiva vināśaṃ muktau jānīyāt na tasyai spṛhayet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2902: tathāca jñāpakatayānuṣṭhāpakatayā ca prāmāṇyaṃ bhajatāṃ mokṣaśāstrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bhajyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2904: yathā dehagehādyupalakṣitaḥ pṛthivībhāgaḥ sthāsyatīti svadehagehanāśe na pravarteta svayameva kaścit prekṣāpūrvakārī,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2905: evamahamarthopalakṣitaḥ prakāśaḥ sthāsyatīti buddhyā na svanāśāya mokṣāya jñātāhamarthaḥ pravarteteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2909: na tu tadbhinnasyāhamarthasyeti pakṣaṃ pratikṣipati etene ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2910: ahaṃ jānāmīti pratyaye caitanyaikarūpaḥ parāgbhinnaḥ pratyak yaḥ jānāmīti pratīyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2912: tasminnadhiṣṭhāne bhāsamānaḥ tadadhīnaprakāśaḥ ahamartho yuṣmadarthalakṣaṇa eva-parāgarthasvarūpaṃ eva,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2916: lakṣaṇato yuṣmadartha eveti parāktvaṃ cāhamarthasyānātmatve liṅgamuktam lakṣaṇataḥ-svarūpataḥ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:2928: ahamartho yuṣmadartha iti pratijñāvākye virodhamāha aham iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2930: nanu yuṣmadartha iti ḷ ākṣaṇikaṃ parāktvaparam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2932: parāktvaṃ cāhamarthasya cidadhīnaprakāśatvādityatrā'ha na cāsā viti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2938: atha tadā muktasyāhantvena bhāne 'numānaṃ samagrāṅgakanyāyamukhena prapañcayati sa ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2940: evaṃ bhāsamānatve- ahantvena bhāsamānatve muktasya saṃsāriṇa ivājñatvādi nāpādayituṃ śakyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2942: muktātmā ajñānavān saṃsaraṇadharmavān vā ahantvena bhāsamānatvāt saṃsāryātmavaditi anumānaṃ muktaviśeṣa- pratipādakaśāstrabādhitamiti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2945: tarhyajñānādimān syāditi prasañjanameva kriyata iti cettatrāpyāha atadupādhitvā diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2961: kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣar iśvara iti hi yogatantre prasiddham /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2962: sarvadā sarvathāvidyārahitasyeśvarasyāhamiti svātmani pratyayo nāvidyādimūlaḥ saṃbhavediti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2968: naca sopādhirīśvaro 'ntaryāmī muktaprāpyo vā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2969: tathā mṛtyusaṃsārasāgaratārakaṃ śuddhameva svarūpaṃ bhagavato 'hamiti nirdiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaha mityatra /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2974: kintu sarvajñamiti jñāpanāya copāttaṃ vedāham iti vacanam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2977: nanvevamahambhāvasyā'tmasvarūpatve 'haṅkārasya kṣetrāntarbhāvavacanaṃ tyājyatvapratipādanaṃ ca gītāsthaṃ kathamityatrā'ha evaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2981: tathā cānahami dehe 'hamabhimānaheturanātmani ātmabhramaheturahaṅkāraḥ kṣetrāntargatatvenopadiṣṭa iti phalitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2982: atha ahaṅkāraṃ balaṃ darpam iti tyājyatvenoktasyāhaṅkārasyābhijanādinimittadurabhimānamūlagarvarūpatvamāha bahumantavye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2987: cvyarthamanantarbhāvya tu vyutpanno 'haṅkāra iti ātmani ahaṃ buddhivācīti vivekaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2992: ātmanyeṣa na doṣāya śabdo 'hamiti yo dvija /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2998: dehātmabhramākāraparīkṣāto 'pi svīkāryamahamarthatvamātmana ityāha na ca jñaptī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3015: na khalu sukhaduḥkhecchādayo vidyamānā api kadācidamavabhāsamānā bhavanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3019: yadi matam-avyabhicaritaprakāśo 'pi sukhādiranyasmai prakāśata iti ghaṭa iva jaḍatāṃ nātivartate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3022: anyasyaiva hi tadapi jānato 'hamarthasya prathate 'haṃ jānāmīti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3025: ataḥ sattayaiva svamātmānaṃ prati sidhyannajaḍo 'hamartha evātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3027: ata eva hi svāśrayacetanaṃ prati prakaṭatā,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3034: tadapi hi tena niyatena sahopalambhamityahamarthādanarthāntaraṃ mithyārūpamevā'padyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3037: na ca viśeṣamātraṃ nirdhūtanikhilaviṣayaviśeṣopaśleṣaṃ vā vittimātramasti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3045: api ca nilataddhiyoriti dve upādāya abheda ityekatvavidhiḥ savitrīvandhyātvavidhiriva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3060: sa ca sarvadāhamiti bhāsate iti kārikārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3067: atha jñānasyā'tmatve sādhakatvena parairupanyastamajaḍatvamapi vikalpya dūṣayati yadukta mityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3074: anātmasu sukhādiṣvapi niruktājaḍatvasya sattvāt vyabhicāra ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3091: tatprakāśaṃ nityamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya svasattāprayuktatvakīrtanaṃ viruddhaṃ ca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3093: svasmai svayaṃ bhāsamānatvarūpamajaḍatvamātmatve sādhakaṃ tu svarūpāsiddhamityāha yadi matam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3109: saṃvida ātmatvamādhakamajaḍatvaṃ pradūṣya jñātrādeḥ saṃvidabhedasādhakaṃ prakaṭasaugatābhimataṃ sahopalambhaniyamaṃ dūṣayati naca jñānene ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:3113: ahamarthena sahaivopalambhaṃ saṃvida upapādayati tadapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3117: kiñca, tadupalambhavyāpyopalambhavattvarūpo hi sahopalambhaniyamaḥ paraiḥ tadabhedasādhako mataḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3118: sa cāyamahamarthasya saṃvidabhedasādhane pakṣe 'siddha ityāha asiddhaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3119: atra vikalpaḥ-kiṃ jñānaviśeṣeṇa tena tena sahopalambhaniyamo 'hamarthasya vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3123: cākṣuṣādijñānaprakāśamantarāpi ahamarthasya jñānāntaraprakāśe prakāśamānatvāditi pratyekaṃ vyabhicāradarśanā dityuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3125: na nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyam iti nyāyāccākṣuṣādivyatiriktaṃ jñānaviśeṣamātraṃ jñānamātraṃ vā nāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3130: vināpi jñānaprakāśenāhamarthaprakāśo 'stītyāha siddhāntarītyā ca samaste ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3133: iti tena saṃvidahamarthayoraikyasādhane pratijñāhetuvākyayorvirodha ekaṃ dvitvāditivaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3135: sahopalambhaniyamādabhedo nīlataddhiyo rityevaṃ hi teṣāṃ pratijñā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3140: tathā ca saṃvidā sahopalambhaniyamabhājāṃ jaḍatvamūrtatvādīnāṃ saṃvidabhede saṃvido jaḍatvamūrtatvādiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3146: abhedasādhakaṃ hetvantaramapi tulyarītyā nirasyati niyamenaike ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3163: naca pratiyoginaḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ vā bhedasyā'parokṣye tvapekṣitavyam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3165: anavabhāsamāne 'pi pratiyogini bhāvāḥ svarūpata eva vilakṣaṇāḥ pratyakṣyanta iti sarvalokasvasākṣikametat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3166: nanu jīvato bhedapratyakṣasya śirasi padanidhānena sahopalambhaniyamasyābhedena pratibandhagrahaṇamiti kathamiva tatastadvādhasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3169: tatra hi kḷptakāraṇadoṣānuvṛttau satyāṃ jāyamāno 'parokṣāvabhāso na niravadyapratyakṣapūrvakamanumānaṃ bādhitumarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3170: tathāhi-aciranirvāpitāropiteṣvekavartibhāgavartiṣu bahuṣudīpeṣu tadbhedādarśinaḥ susadṛśatayā sa evāyamiti smṛtirupajāyate iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3185: aprakāśātmanaśca nīlādeḥ prakāśa ityanubhavasiddhatvānna samarthanāntaraṃ prārthayate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3190: ātmā tu svatantro jñātā ahamiti pratyātmaṃ prathate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3196: ata eva hi cchandogāḥ-'atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā' ityādyāmananti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3197: tathā 'katama ātmā' iti praśnapūrvakamidameva lakṣaṇamāmananti vājasaneyinaḥ 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3198: atra hi yo 'yaṃ sarvalokānubhavasiddho vividhaviṣayavedanapracuraḥ prāṇeṣu prerakatayā sthito hṛdayāyatane antarjyotiḥ ahamiti pratyaktvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:3200: 'eṣa hi draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ' ityātharvaṇāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3201: tathā 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāditi' 'na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām'
GSP33yaatsi_u:3202: 'sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ nopajanaṃ smarannidaṃ śarīram' 'evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśakalāḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3205: 'satyaṃ jñāna' mityatrāpi brahmalakṣaṇanirdeśe jñānaśabdo na jñānamātravacanaḥ ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3211: aitareyopaniṣadapi 'prajñānaṃ brahye'tyuktvā 'sa etena prājñenātmanā' iti prakṛṣṭajñānavantameveśvaraṃ darśayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3214: kiṃ punarasmin dehādivyatirekiṇi cetane pratyagātmani pramāṇam? / anu
GSP33yaatsi_u:3228: evamāśrayamātramupasthāpayanto 'nvayavyatirekiṇo hetavaḥ dravyāntaraguṇatvaṃ ca pratyācakṣāṇaiḥ kevalavyatirekisādhanairātmagocaratayā niyamyante
GSP33yaatsi_u:3236: nāpi tadguṇānāṃ pratyakṣatvamiti na teṣāmapi guṇāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3238: tenecchādayo na śarīraguṇāḥ tadguṇabhāvāpavādapramāṇavattve sati guṇatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3243: vimatipadāspadebhyaḥ śarīrādibhyor'thāntaraguṇā icchādaya iti vā pratijñā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3246: sāmānyena vānvayaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ-yo yadguṇabhāvāpavādakapramāṇavattve sati guṇaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3259: naca sādhanābhāve sādhyābhāvadarśanamātreṇa sādhyānvitasvabhāvatvaṃ śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3276: ahaṅkārānvayavyatirekānuvidhānena ” devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ ” ityādyāgamabalena prakāśalāghavaguṇānvayena
GSP33yaatsi_u:3290: tadarthaṃ ca śāstrāṇāṃ mahādhiyāṃ ca pravṛtterasti dehādivyatirikto 'saṃhataḥ traiguṇyādyasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ puruṣa iti //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3292: atrāpi saṅghātapārārthyādibhiryadyapi paraḥ ko 'pyadhiṣṭhātā draṣṭā siddhaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3302: na ca tathā sāṅkhyapuruṣa iti kataṃ tasya saṅghātaṃ prati paratvam ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:3307: na khalu bālāstalamalinatādimattayā gaganamabhimanyanta iti tasya tathātvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3308: api ca tathāvidhabhramo 'pi kasya kathamudayata iti vivecanīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3311: antaḥkaraṇaṃ tu buddhyaparaparibhāṣābhidhānamacetanatayā tanuriva na bhrāmyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3312: acidapi svacchatayā citicchāyāpannaṃ cetanāyata iti cet; na;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3321: yathā'ha tatrabhavān patañjaliḥ ” yadā citireva puruṣaḥ kimatra kena vyapadiśyata ” iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3326: api ca citisannidhānādhīnāṃ buddhisiddhimabhidadhānaḥ kathamiva tadajaḍimānaṃ pratijānīyāt?
GSP33yaatsi_u:3335: naca dṛśimātrātmavādināṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ tadupajīvināṃ ca pracchannānāṃ draṣṭṛtvaṃ vāstavamasti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3338: rājā tu sāmānyato viśeṣato vā teṣu karmasvamātyān niyuñjānaḥ tatphalamaiśvaryādi
GSP33yaatsi_u:3345: 'sa eṣa neti neti' 'akāyamavraṇamasnāviraṃ śuddhamapāpaviddham' 'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3346: sthāṇumanye' 'na jāyate mriyate vā kadācit' 'jīvāpetaṃ vāvakiledaṃ mriyate' 'na hi vai saśarīrasya sataḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3348: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ' ityādyāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3351: nanu hitāhitaprāptiparihāramātraparasyā'mnāyasya śirasi kimiti mahānayaṃ bhāraḥ prakṣipyate?
GSP33yaatsi_u:3354: idamahaṃ jānāmīti ghaṭādidṛśyebhya ivāyaṃ draṣṭā dehādapi pṛthagbhūtaḥ pratyakṣaṃ parisphurati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3358: na cendriyāṇi rūpādivyatirekiṇi niratiśayasūkṣme pratīci parāgartha iva sannikarṣeṇa jñānaṃ janayitumarhanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3362: utāho tadabhedataḥ-saṃvidabhinnatvāt prakāśamanurudhyate iti saṃdehānnīlatadviyorabhedo 'śakyanirṇaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3364: idaṃ ca kiṃ saṃvidabhedaprayuktamuta svaprakāśe nīlāderjaḍasya svaprakāśasaṃvidapekṣāprayuktamiti viśaye yāvadabhedaprayuktatvanirṇayo na bhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3374: kintu bodhyayoreva tathābhūtayorabheda iṣyatāṃ guṇaguṇiprabhṛtyoḥ kathañcidityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3380: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti hi sphuṭo jñeyajñātṛjñānānāṃ bhedapratibhāsaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3385: prakṛte saṃvido jñānāntarāgocaratvena svayaṃprakāśatvāttadbhedapratyakṣaṃ jñātari na saṃbhavatīti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3395: pratiyoginaḥ prakṛte vedanasya prakāśastu svata evāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3398: sa ca pratiyogyanavabhāse 'pi bhāsata evotyāha anavabhāsamāna iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3399: tathā ca jñāturahantvena bhānameva saṃvidbhedagrahaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3406: tattadasādhāraṇa dharmasyaivetarabhedarūpatvāttasya ca dharmiṇi prathamakṣaṇa eva gṛhīteḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3407: ata evāpūrvavastudarśane vilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ kaścana padārtha iti bhedapratītirlokasammatā svānubhavasiddhā ca nāpahnavārhā iti sarvalokasvasākṣika mityuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3415: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- bhinnatvena gṛhyamāṇayoreva hi sahopalambhaniyamo 'bhedavyāpyatvena gṛhītaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3416: tena cābhedānumāne pratyakṣe bhedagrahaṇāṃśobhramalakṣaṇa iti niścīyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3423: tatre ti / na pratyakṣatvamanumānatvaṃ vā bādhyatve bādhakatve vā prayojakam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3431: nirvāpaṇapunaruddīpanadraṣṭuśca jvālayorbhedaprtyakṣaṃ vartata iti tena bādhitatvamapi nirvāpaṇādyadraṣṭṛniṣṭha jvālayokyapratyakṣe viva
GSP33yaatsi_u:3438: evaṃ pūrvottaradīpajvālayorbhede siddhe sajātīyadīpadhārāyāṃ bhedāgrahātsādṛśyarūpadoṣadarśanāccaikyabhrama iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3442: dṛṣṭāntitāt dārṣṭāntike vaiṣamyamupapādayati na caivam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3446: viparītaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyatrāha na copalabdhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3449: vipakṣe bādhakatarkavirahādvyāptyasiddhyāsiddhamabhedānumānaṃ na jñānajñātṛjñeyabhedapratyakṣe bādhakatvena śakyaśaṅkamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3452: atra bādhakapratyayo 'pi nāsti candradvitvabhrama ivetyāha yogyānupalambhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3453: na caivamihe ti vākyābhipretamanena vākyadvayena vivṛtam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3454: saṃvidadhīne tivākyoktaṃ prapañcayati api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3457: nanu saṃvidamantarāpi viṣayādiḥ sidhyatvityatrāha na ca bhedo 'pī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3463: bhedapratibhāso 'pi saṃvidaiva vācya iti niruktahetorbhedasyāpi saṃvidabhede bhedaghaṭito heturapi na sidhyediti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3464: yadvā bhavadabhimataḥ saṃvidāṃ bhedopi na sidhyediti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3465: evaṃ prakaṭasaugatābhimataṃ saṃvidabhedasādhakaṃ sahopalambhaniyamaṃ pradūṣya pracchannasaugatābhimataṃ prakāśasvabhāvatvamapi dūṣayati aprakāśe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3472: na sādhyamityāha na ca tāvate ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3481: dhārāvāhikavijñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ mataṃ hi naḥ iti pakṣe tu svarūpata evānuvartamānaṃ yāvadviṣayāntarasaṃcāramiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3484: nanvevaṃ jñānabhinnatve ātmano jñānamiti vyapadeśaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭata ityatrāha yadī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3493: tataśca jñāturātmano jñānābhedānumānaṃ parābhimataṃ prabalapratyakṣabādhitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3494: pratyakṣatarkasiddhamātmano jñātṛtvamāgamato 'pi pratiṣṭhāpayati ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3498: jñātṛtvaṃ ca svayaṃprakāśatvājjñānaśabditasyātmanaḥ pratipādayadvākyam eṣa hī tyādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3503: muktidaśāyāṃ jñānābhāvaśrutirheyadarśanābhāvapareti na paśya ityādi vyavasthāpayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3505: bhagavadvibhūtitayā hi sarvasya svānukūlatvena darśanaṃ tadā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3508: sa tatra paryetī tyādi nopajanaṃ smaran ityantamatrodāhāryat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3511: evaṃ jñātṛtvamātmano vyavasthāpya paramātmano 'pi tadvyavasthāpayati satyam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3523: dehendriyamanaḥ prāṇadhībhyo 'nya iti pratijñātātmasvarūpanirūpaṇamupasaṃharati tatsiddham iti //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3524: atha ananyasādhana iti pratijñātaṃ svayaṃprakāśatvamātmanaḥ samarthayituṃ pramāṇaparīkṣāmupakramate kiṃ puna rityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3526: yadyapyahaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣameva tatra pramāṇaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3528: athāpi vilakṣaṇātmaviṣayatvaṃ pratyakṣasyedaṃ pramāṇamatraivaṃ pravartitumarhatītyevaṃ sāmagrīnirūpaṇādyātmakena tarkeṇaiva vyavasthāpyamityāśayaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3534: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- vyāptigrahasya sahacāradarśanamūlakatvena vilakṣaṇātmanā sahacāradarśane icchādīnāṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva tasya siddheḥ kṛtamanumānena
GSP33yaatsi_u:3548: atra hetuṃ sādhayati guṇatvaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3549: padārthatvena dravyādyanyatamatve prāpte dravyādibhedakānumānato dravyatvādivyudāse dravyādibhedaviśiṣṭaṃ padārthatvameva pariśiṣyamāṇaṃ guṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3558: guṇatvaṃ prasādhya viśeṣaguṇatvaṃ prasādhayati viśeṣe ti/
GSP33yaatsi_u:3571: parantu prabhātvajāteḥ prāmāṇikatve vāyoḥ spārśanopagame vā guṇatvadalamāvaśyakameveti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3598: na caivaṃ sādhyavyatirekasyāpyanumānātpūrvamaprasiddhyā vyatirekyudāharaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ ghaṭata iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3600: anvayavyāptirvā sāmānyamukhī sambhavatītyāha sāmānyato ve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3603: evaṃ ca kevalavyatirekyanupagame 'pi na kṣatiriti dhyeyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3604: naiyāyikābhimatāṃ vilakṣaṇātmasiddhimānumānikīṃ pratikṣipanti śrotriyāḥ idamapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3605: anvayināśrayamātrasya siddhāvapi kevalavyatirekiṇā'śrayaviśeṣaḥ setsyatītyatrāha kevale ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3612: evaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇo 'pi vyāptigrahāyogāt na gamakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3614: kevalavyatirekiṇi tu sapakṣasyaiva virahānna doṣa iti cet;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3617: asti cedyatra prasiddhiḥ tatra hetoḥ sattve 'nvayitvam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3619: nāsti cet sādhyavyatirekasyāpyaprasiddheḥ kevalavyatirekitvamapi durghaṭamiti dik /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3626: anvayavyatirekiṇi ubhayavidhasahacāradarśanādvyāptigrahasya dṛṣṭeḥ sādhyahetvo sahacārādarśanātkevalavyatirekiṇo 'sādhakatvaṃ cedabhimatam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3629: kasmiṃściddeśe kāle vā hetuḥ sādhyamantarāpi prayojakāntarāt syāditi deśakālaviśeṣāntarbhāveṇa
GSP33yaatsi_u:3635: vyatirekavyāptigraha eva vyatirekasahacāragrahasyāpekṣayā kevalānvayini anvayavyāptigrahasya vyatirekāprasiddhāvapi nānupapattiriti ca bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3636: vipakṣasattksyaivāprasiddhyaiva rūpapañcakasampattiḥ kevalānvayina iti cāśayaḥ siddhāntinām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3637: nanvevaṃ sādhyasādhanavyatirekayoḥ sahacāradarśanata eva vyatirekavyāptigraha upapadyata iti śaṅkate na ca sādhanābhāva iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3644: nanu yāvatsu pratyakṣeṣvadhikaraṇeṣu vyatirekayoḥ sahacāradarśanata eva vyāptirniścīyetetyatrāha sandehe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3647: hetvabhāvo māstviti śaṅkāyāṃ ca na sādhanābhāvavyāpyatvaṃ sādhyābhāve gṛhyetānukūlatarkavirahe / sādhyasyā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3651: viśiṣṭahetunā pṛthivyādivyatiriktaguṇatvānumāne ca sādhyāprasiddhimāha pṛthivyādibhya iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3655: niruktasamavetatvasya guṇakriyābhinna eva prasiddherguṇe jñānādau tatsādhanāyogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3659: vilakṣaṇātmasādhakatvena sāṅkhyābhimatāneva hetūn prathamaṃ vivṛṇumahe śiṣyavaiśadyāya kṣepasaukaryāya ceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3673: sādhyaghaṭakasya ca parasyābhimatāsaṃhatatvaviruddhasya saṃhatatvasyā'pādakatvādviruddhatvaṃ saṅghātatvahetoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3676: ahaṅkāravṛttau satyāmevendriyāṇāṃ manaḥparyantānāṃ vṛtterdarśanāttadabhāve ca svāpe 'darśanādāhaṅkārikatvaṃ teṣāmavasīyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3688: asaṃhatasyāpyātmanaścetanatvādeva bhoktṛtvasyopapatteḥ bhoktatvalakṣaṇe paratve prādhānye saṅghātatvasyāprayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3689: yadi saṅghātatvasya paratve prayojakatvaṃ syāttarhi saṃhataparārthatvena vyāptiḥ sambhavennāma saṅghātatvasya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3692: tathā ca saṃhataparārthatve saṅghātatvasya vyāpyatvāsiddhatvamiti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3694: saṅghātatvasya parārthatvena vyāptistu pramāṇāntaravirodhābhāvātprasetsyatītyāha na ca pramāṇāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3697: parasya saṃhatatve 'navasthāprasakteḥ traiguṇyaviparyayaḥ atraiguṇyātmakatvarūpo mantavya ityuktam asaṃhata iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3713: evaṃ sukhenānukūlanīyasya duḥkhena pratikūlanīyasya vā bhoktuḥ triguṇatve tasyāpi
GSP33yaatsi_u:3717: kaivalyārthaṃ pravṛtteśce tyaṃśaṃ vivṛṇoti tathā dehāde riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3722: dehādeḥ pradhānaparyantasya pariṇāmasvabhāvasya triguṇasya kaivalyānupapattijñānācca vilakṣaṇātmasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3732: evamuparyuparīti kāraṇaparamparākalpanā yathā prāmāṇikī na doṣāya,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3734: nanu saṅghātatvasya bhoktṛtvalakṣaṇe paratve 'hetutvānna saṅghātaparārthatvena saṅghātatvasya vyāptigraha ityatrā'ha na ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3743: atastadadhīnātiśayabhāktvarūpe tatparatve saṅghātatvasya prayojakatvena tadavacchinnaparārthatvena vyāptigrahaḥ sambhavatyeveti cābhimatam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3745: yadyenopakriyate kriyate vā tattasya śeṣi pradhānamaṅgi bhavati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3746: yattūpakaroti karoti vā tattadarthaṃ taccheṣaḥ tadaṅgamityanvayārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3758: nanvanupakāryatve 'pyātmana etairupakṛto 'hamityupakṛtatvabhramalakṣaṇa evopakāro dehādibhiḥ sādhya iti tatparatvamupapadyata iti cettatrāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3768: chāyāyāḥ kāntilakṣaṇāyā ujjavalarūpavaddharmabhūtāyā nīrūpe caitanye 'sambhavānnīrūpe cāntaḥkaraṇe tatpratiphalanalakṣaṇasaṅkrānterayogādityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3769: rūpavatyeva hi sphaṭikādau japākusumalohitādipratiphalanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3780: bhramādayo hi vṛttayo 'ntaḥkaraṇasya nirvṛttikatve nopapadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3790: tathā caivaṃvidhājaḍatvasya jñātṛtvasamānāśrayatvājjñātṛtvenaiva jñātṛtvasamanarthanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3797: yadvā na kiñcidetat-anatiprasaktaṃ prakṛtārthopapādakaṃ durnirūpamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3798: antaḥkaraṇasyājaḍatvopagame sāṅkhyasyāpasiddhāntaṃ cāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3799: nanvantaḥkaraṇasya citisārūpyāsambhave 'pi tasmin citipratibimba eva jñātṛtvādimānastu ityatrāha na ca citī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3803: bimbagatasya vakratādeḥ pratibimbādhāragatasya vā mālinyādeḥ pratibimbe āropasambhavaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3804: na ca jñātṛtvaṃ bhramo vā prakṛte 'nyatarasminnapyasti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3809: tataśca citibuddhyorvivekāgrahācciti jñātṛtvapratibhāso yujyata eveti śaṅkate yaducyata ityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3810: nirvikārāyā api citiśakteḥ sannidhānabalādevāntaḥkaraṇasya pratyakṣādipramāṇajñānabhrāntyādilakṣaṇā vṛttibhedāḥ samudayante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3811: prādhānyāt citeḥ tāsāṃ sākṣitvaṃ bhoktatvaṃ ca,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3812: yathā niśceṣṭasyāpi sārvabhaumasya prādhānyāt prabalasāmantacakrakartṛkayuddhaparākramavijayabhāktvaṃ tadvaditi śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3818: draṣṭṛtvaṃ kalpitamiti cet nirvikāre nirdharmake kūṭasthe caitanye draṣṭṛtvabhramo 'pi na sambhavatītyuktameva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3819: dṛṣṭānte tu na nirvyāpāratvaṃsārvabhaumasya nirdharmakatvaṃ vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3824: nanu sāṅkhyābhimatasyātmano 'numānāsambhave 'pi naiyāyikādibhirādheyātiśayatvena bhoktatvena cābhimatasyātmanaḥ saṅghātaparārthatvānumānena sādhanaṃ syāditi cet, na /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3825: saṅghātasya saṃhataparārthatvena vyāprerasaṃhatasya parasya siddherayogāt / naca
GSP33yaatsi_u:3829: śarīrādivyatiriktasya bhoktaranumānātpūrvamasiddhyā ca vilakṣaṇabhoktrarthatvena vyāpteragrahādvilakṣaṇātmasādhanāyoga iti dik /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3834: dehādibhede ātmanaḥ śrutimeva pramāṇatayopanyasyanti śrotriyāḥ sa eṣa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3842: tathāca dehāderevotpattyādi nātmana ityatra śrutirna jāyata iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3845: muktautvaśarīratvamevetyatra śrutimupādatte na ha vai iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3846: śrutiṃ pramāṇamuktvā vilakṣaṇātmani śrutyarthāpattimapi pramāṇamāha kālāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3850: dehavināśordhvabhāvisvargādisādhanakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ tadvidhānaṃ vā bhoktarātmano dehātirekaṃ nityatvaṃ ca vinā hi na ghaṭate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3853: śāstratastu vilakṣaṇātmana upakaraṇatvenaiva tatsiddhiriti vilakṣaṇātmasiddhiḥ śāstrato niṣpratyūheti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3854: vilakṣaṇātmani anumānaikapramāṇakatvamāgamaikapramāṇakatvaṃ ca matabhedenopapādya pratyakṣatvaṃ mīmāṃsakamatena nirūpayitumupakramate nanu hitāhite ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3861: pratyakṣeṇaiva sphuṭamadhigamyata iti nātra purovāditālakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ śāstrasya sambhavatīti śrotriyopari pratyavasthānaṃ mīmāṃsakasya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3862: ātmana indriyāgrāhyatvaṃ śaṅkate 'tra śrotriyaḥ maivaṃ voca ityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3867: yogya eva hi pratyakṣaṃ prabhavati nāyogya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3881: kḷptaṃ ca bahirindriyāgocare 'pi sukhādau svāntasvātantryamiti tannimitta evāyamahaṃpratyayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3882: prayogaśca bhavati-ātmā mānasapratyakṣagrāhyaḥ bahirindriyāyogyatve sati pratyakṣatvātsukhādivat iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3891: tadaiva kiṃ tata eva tadgocaramapi vedanaṃ janyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3901: kāryavirodhitve cānantarameva saṃskārodayānna kālāntare sthitiriti saṃvido na mānasapratyakṣavedyatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3907: na hi tasminnapratyakṣe tatpauṣkalyaṃvaikalyaṃ vā pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3920: ekasya cātmano niraṃśasya na svāpekṣayā grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3932: ucyate / aho khalu svānubhava eva vibhramaḥ parīkṣakāṇām,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3933: yat viṣayānubhavasamaye pūrvāvasthāto na kañcidviśeṣamayamātmano 'vabudhyata iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3936: mama vā pratibhāsate parasya vetyapi na vidma iti na
GSP33yaatsi_u:3939: so 'yaṃ parasaṃcetitāt svasaṃcetitasyātiśayaḥ sarvatra parisphurannasati grāhakāvabhāse nopapadyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3968: tathā prapañcitaṃ prathamādhikaraṇa iti nātropakṣipya pratikṣeptavyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3969: sato 'pi prameyajātasya svāpādisamaye 'nupalabderabhyupagataṃ tāvat saṃvidaḥ tatsādhakatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3973: tat upapattibhirupapadyamānamapi yathāpratīti vyavaharatāṃ na cittamanurañjayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3977: yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭādīti cātra prayogaḥ //17//
GSP33yaatsi_u:3993: tatra saṃvidi hetau viśeṣaṇāṃśasya siddhatvādviśeṣyāṃśaṃ tāvatsādhayati na ca tadi ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3996: nanu jñātatayaiva jñānānumānamityananyopādhikatvaṃ jñānapratibhāsasyāsiddhamityatrāha apratyakṣatve ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3998: satyā api tasyā atīndriyatvena jñānasya tenāvinābhāvagrahāyogāt,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3999: jñānajanakasāmagryā jñātatāyā eva sākṣājjananasambhavādantarā jñānakalpanāyā apārthatvāccāsiddhireva syājjñānasyāpratyakṣatva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4000: saṃvedane sādhyasyāpi sattvamāśaṅkate na ca tadapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4008: pratyakṣe viṣayasya hetutvātpūrvajñānajanitasyottarajñānasyānuvyavasāyarūpasya pūrvajñānaviṣayakatvamupapadyeta kramabhāvitve na tu yaugapadya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4009: astu tarhi kramikatvaṃ viṣayajñānatadanuvyavasāyayorityatraha asame ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4011: jñānasya kṣaṇikatvānupagame doṣamāha bhāve ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4014: kintu svakāryeṇaiva nivṛttiriṣyate jñānasyeti cettatrāha kārye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4018: atra tu sahānavasthānalakṣaṇa eva virodho vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4027: athāpi siddhāntaprakriyayā jñānāvasthārūpatvātsukhādeḥ jñānasya ca svayaṃprakāśatvātsvayaṃprakāśatvaṃ sukhāderhṛdi nidhāya sādhyavikalatvameva kīrtitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4028: anvayaddaṣṭānte sādhyasya sādhanasya vā virahena tadavacchedena sādhyavyāptigraho hetau sambhavatīti vyāpyatvāsiddhirvivakṣitā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4032: ahaṃ cakṣuṣmān paśyāmīti pratyakṣavadavabhāsaścakṣurādeḥ kadāciccākṣuṣādivṛtti kāle nānācakṣurādivṛtti pratisandhānavataścetanasyendriyaviṣayasaṃskāraprācuryaprayuktaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4036: kāmasaṅkalpādīnāṃ manovṛttirūpatvaṃ kāmaḥsaṅkalpaḥ- sarvaṃ mana eve ti śrutyāpratīyate / teṣāṃ ca
GSP33yaatsi_u:4040: ātmana āgantukadharmarūpatvaṃ ca matabhedena prasiddhamanuvadati yastusugate ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4044: nityasyātmana āgantukadharmarūpatvaṃ vā manyamānābhyāṃ nyāyatattvaśāstrasthaṃ sukhaduḥkhādhikaraṇam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4046: nanu sukhaduḥkhayoḥ mānasapratyakṣatve vivāde 'pi rāgadveṣāveva nidarśane bhaviṣyata ityatrāha sukhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4047: sukhatvaprayuktaṃ viṣayīkaraṇamupādeyatāprakāśanaṃ yataḥ tajjñānameva rāgaḥ sukhagocaropādeyatābuddhilakṣaṇa iti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4048: tasya sukhasya virodha upaghāto yena tadgocaratyājyatāprakāśakajñānameva ca dveṣaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4049: tayośca jñānavadeva prakāśa iti naṃ sādhyānvaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4055: tayoścāntaḥkaraṇadharmatvādeva na pratyakṣatvamiti dṛṣṭāntatvāyoga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4056: ātmano mānasapratyakṣatve sādhakasyāsambhavamuktvā bādhakamapyāha ekasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4062: anyadā cāṃśāntareṇaitadaṃśagrahaṇamiti kālabhedenopapatternānavastheti cettatrāpyāha saṅghātatvaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4063: ātmano niraṃśatvaviruddhaṃ ca sāṃśatvamevaṃ sati prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4068: evaṃ prābhākareṇa dūṣite svapakṣe bhāṭṭastanmatamapi dūṣayati nanu ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4071: atra na ca grāhakābhāsa iti pāṭhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4073: svasiddhāntetyataḥ pūrvaṃ sa tu iti yojyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4077: anubhavaviruddhaṃ hi na śrutiḥ pratipādayediti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4079: svasiddhāntābhimānibhiḥ prābhākarairabhihito grāhakāvabhāso na mantavyaḥ pratītivirodhāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4083: yasya yadviṣaye jñānaṃ jātaṃ tasyaiva sor'thaḥ prakāśata iti prākaṭyasyā'tmapratiyogikatvamarthadharmasya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4088: atra ca mānasapratyakṣe jñānavattvena viṣayatvaṃ dehādimattayā cāśrayatvamiti karmakartṛvirodhaparihāro 'bhimato bhāṭṭānām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4094: viṣayavedanakāle jñānasya jñātuścāvabhāsābhāve doṣaṃ pūrvoktaṃ smārayati ukta mityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4096: jñātuḥ prakāśābhāve mama jñāyate 'nyasya veti saṃśayādiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4102: na tu jānāmīti jñāne vartamānatvollekha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4103: nanvatiśaighryāt kṣaṇabhedāgrahanibandhano vartamānatvāṃśe bhramalakṣaṇo jānāmīti pratyaya iti śaṅkāyāṃ tanmate dūṣaṇāntaramapi saṃsphorayati jñāne ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4105: jñātatāliṅgakamapi jñānānumānaṃ jñānena jñātatāyā avinābhāvagrahāsambhavājjñānasāmagryaivānyathāsiddhatvācca jñātatāyā duḥsthameveti hārdam
GSP33yaatsi_u:4106: viṣayajñāna eva jñātuḥ prakāśaṃ sādhayituṃ tasya mānasapratyakṣaṃ ca nirasyati mānase ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4111: ātmano mānasapratyakṣatvaṃ ca vyabhicārātsādhakatvābhimatasya nirastaṃ sādhakābhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4114: atrā'tmagrāhyadhīvyabhicāranirastamiti vā anyathā vā mūlapāṭhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4115: evaṃ grahagrāhakayoḥ prakārāntareṇa bhānāsambhavamupapādya tadanavabhāse viṣayavittau pūrvoktātiśayāsambhavaṃ nigamayati tathāsatī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4117: svasmai jñāyamānatvena bhānamabhānaṃ cārthasyeti vailakṣaṇyasya virahaḥ svaparavedyayoḥ prasajyate viṣayavittau jñānajñātrorabhāne hītyarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4119: svasmai bhāsamānatvarūpo viśeṣor'thasya tajjñānasya svaniṣṭhatvādeva ghaṭate tajjñāne svasyābhāne 'pi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4120: viṣayabodhāśrayatvameva svasyātiśayo 'pūrvo viṣayavittikāla iti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4121: naca vittiveditroragrahe pūrvoktaḥ saṃśayastadavastha iti vācyam/
GSP33yaatsi_u:4122: svajñānajārthadharmaprakāśasya svaṃ prati pratyakṣatvādeva mama prakāśate na veti saṃśayasyānavakāśāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4123: jñānaphalaprakāśena jhaṭityeva jñānasyānumānācca mama jñānaṃ jātamanyasya vetyāderapyaprasakteḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4125: na niruktasaṃśayādiprasaṅgo jñānajñātroranavabhāse 'pi viṣayavittāviti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4126: ātmani bodhodaye ātmaprakāśasya hetutvaṃ nirasyati prasaṅgataḥ na cātme ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4127: nanu ātmasiddhyaghaṭitāpi viṣayabodhasāmagryevātmaprakāśe 'pi heturastvityatrāha na ca viṣaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4130: viṣayabodhe bodhasyāpyaprakāśa ityāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4132: tat padārthānāṃ jātiguṇādiviśeṣavyavasthā yadadhīnā tadapi saṃvedanaṃ viṣayaprakāśakāle 'prakāśamānasvarūpaṃ svarūpasadeva cakṣurādivadityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4139: jñānasyaivāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ-yat svaviṣayasyeva svasvāśrayaprakāśahetutvamapīti punaḥ prābhākaraḥ śaṅkate astu tarhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4142: tacca jñānaṃ svasāmarthyādeva aviṣayamapi svaṃ svāśrayaṃ ca prakāśayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4152: evaṃ svaprakāśatvamuktvā jñānasya viṣayaprakāśahetutvaṃ ca sādhayati sato 'pī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4153: sato 'pi viṣayasya svāpe 'prakāśo jñānanivṛttyeti jñānasya viṣayaprakāśakatvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4155: paraprakāśakatvenaiṣṭavyāyāḥ saṃvida eva pramātravabhāsakatvamapi yuktamiti nātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśatvamapi kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4156: svāpe 'pyātmano jñānamastīti matamanūdya khaṇḍayati yattu iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4159: svapo ātmanaḥ prakāśamānatvaṃ nānubhavamātraśaraṇānāṃ hṛdyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4167: naca manaso nityendriyatvena tatsaṃyogādeva tadā jñānaṃ janyata iti yuktam;
GSP33yaatsi_u:4168: svarūpato gaganavat nityasyāpi satastasyendriyabhāvena jñānotpādakatvasya dharmādharmāvarodhanibandhanatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4169: svāpa ātmanaḥ prakāśaṃ niṣidhya muktāvapi taṃ niṣedhati apavṛktasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4173: nanu tarhi muktau sārvajñyaparaśrutīnāṃ kā gatiḥ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:4187: 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi' 'tadā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ' ityādiśukletarasakalakarmaprakṣayaśrutivirodhāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4189: 'nāstyakṛtaḥ kṛtena' 'tadyatheha karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyate evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate' ityādiśravaṇācca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4192: tanmātranimittatve ca sarvadā ātmasvarūpavattadapi vidyata iti saṃsārānavatāraprasaṅgāt,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4194: na ca dehendriyādipratibaddhatayā idānīṃ tadabhāva iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4206: na hi tayā ātmavittiḥ svarūpaṃ vā seddhumarhati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4210: aviṣayau ca viṣayavitterbuddhiboddhārāviti tāvapi na tayā sidhyataḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4219: maivam / sāpi hi viṣayavadevānyasyaiva prakāśamānatayā na svataḥsidhyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4220: svataḥsidhyantī ca sā kimiti kañcideva prati cakāsti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4222: tatsamavāyāditi cet-yatsamavāyinī hi yā saṃvit tasyaiva sā cakāsti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4230: yadi hi pratiyoginirapekṣaiva kadācidātmasvarūpamiva saṃvit prakāśeta,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4233: āśrayapratiyogisāpekṣaiva saṃyogaputratvāderiva tasyāḥ svarūpasatteti na pṛthaksiddhyutprekṣāvakāśaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4234: satyāḥ saṃvidaḥ prakāśavyabhicārābhāvāt svarūpaprayuktaḥ prakāśa iti cet,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4237: na hi te 'pi santo na prakāśante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4238: athārthāntarasādhakatayā sarvavādisaṃmatāyāḥ saṃvida eva paraṃ svayaṃprakāśatvamāśritam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4246: na tadvirahe iti yathādṛṣṭanibandhanaḥ śrotrasyendriya bhāvaḥ tatheti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4250: yogajadharmaprabhāvānmuktāvapi manasa indriyabhāvo 'nuvartata iti mānasamātmajñānaṃ tadā sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4255: mokṣakāle jñānasyātmaviṣayakasya sarvaviṣayakasya vā dharmajanyatve janyabhāvasya vināśitvaniyamātpunarajñānādiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4262: akḷptasyaiva kevalasyātmanaḥ jñānakāraṇatvena kalpanaṃ ca prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4264: ātmasvarūpamātranimittatve muktikālīnasya jñānasya sarvadaiva tat bhavediti saṃsārānavatāraprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4266: viśadatattvasākṣātkārarūpajñānabhāve 'pi saṃsāropagame ca doṣamāha bandhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4267: muktikālajñānasya saṃsārakāle 'pi sattve saṃsārāpekṣayā mokṣe vailakṣaṇyaṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4269: tarhi tāvanmātrameva bhavenmokṣa iti kṛtaṃ jñānādināpārtheneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4270: ātmano muktikālīnajñāne hetubhūtasya nityatve 'pi na saṃsāre tatprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4271: dehādeḥ pratibandhakatvāditi śaṅkate na ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4290: atra ātmā vittisvarūpaṃ vā iti pāṭhaḥ syādvā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4293: aviṣayayorapi jñānajñātrorjñānabalata eva siddhiriti śaṅkate guruḥ nanu vedye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4299: nanu jñānāntaraviṣayatvenaiva tayoḥ prakāśo 'stvityatrāha uktaṃ hī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4300: svabalata eva vitteḥ siddhiṃ śaṅkāsamādhānamukhenāha kuta iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4302: viṣayajñānakāle 'viṣayasyāpi tasya jñānasya prakāśo bhavatītyanāyatyā svīkaraṇīyam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4304: tatra svaprakāśatvamākṣipati gurūktaṃ saṃvidaḥ siddhāntī maiva mityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4305: svāśrayātmādhīnaprakāśatvādeva tasmā eva prakāśamānatvaṃ saṃvido ghaṭata iti svataḥsiddhatvāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33yaatsi_u:4306: atra paraḥ parihāraṃ śaṅkate tatsamavāyāditi ce diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4308: svayaṃprakāśāpi saṃvidātmāpṛthaksiddhatvādātmana eva prakāśata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4325: viṣayaprakāśakāla eva svāśrayāyaiva prakāśamānāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ svaprakāśe viṣayātmasaṃbandhasāpekṣatvameṣitavyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4326: atītādiviṣayajñāne 'pi viṣayeṇa saṃbandho jñānasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvalakṣaṇo vilakṣaṇaḥ svarūpasaṃbandhaviśeṣo 'styeveti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4328: antaḥkaraṇatadvṛttyupadhānaupādhikaṃ kevalaṃ tasyāḥ sāśrayatvādipratītimātramityatrāha āśraye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4335: nirviṣayatvena nirāśrayatvena ca sthitiḥ prakāśo vā saṃvido nāstyeva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4337: tathā ca saṃvitprakāśe ātmasaṃbandhāpekṣāpi durvāraiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4338: svasattāvyāpakaprakāśatvena svaprakāśatvaṃ syātsaṃvida iti punaḥ śaṅkate satyā iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4340: tadā cātmasambandhasya niyatapūrvabhāvitvādapekṣitatvācca saṃvitprakāśe hetutvameṣṭavyameveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4341: niruktahetunā svayaṃprakāśatvasādhane doṣaṃ cāha api caivam iti sukhādiṣvanaikāntyaṃ hetoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4345: kiñca- yo yasya sākṣī tenaiva tasya siddhirna laukikī /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4353: arthasaṃvidāṃ ca sākṣātkārī cetana iti so 'pi na tābhiraparokṣībhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4359: kintu bāhyārthaprakāśakatveneṣṭasya jñānasyaivā'tmaprakāśakatvamapi kalpanīyaṃ lāghavāditi punaḥ śaṅkate guruḥ athārthāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4362: nānāsvayaṃprakāśakalpanāyāṃ gaurave sati sarvārthānāṃ sarvajñānānāṃ ca sākṣātkarturātmana eva svaprakāśatvaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4365: anye sarve bhavantu tadadhīnaprakāśā eveti bhāvaḥ //20//
GSP33yaatsi_u:4375: ślokaṃ vyākhyāti svayameva santu nāme ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4387: evaṃ saṃvedanamapi saṃvidantaraṃ svādhīnasiddhikamindriyādikaṃ vā nāpekṣate svasiddhau;
GSP33yaatsi_u:4389: evamātmāpyātmāntaraṃ svādhīnasiddhi saṃvidindriyādikamapi svāparokṣe nāpekṣata ityananyāpekṣā hyātmasvarūpasiddhiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4391: saṃvidadhīnaprakāśatve bādhakamuktvā'tmanaḥ svaprakāśatve sādhakamapyāha sajātīye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4393: svasādhyaṃ-svādhīnaprakāśaṃ cārthamanapekṣyaiva prakāśamānā iti ātmāpi prakāśamāna ātmāntaraṃ svāpekṣaprakāśaṃ jñānādicānapekṣyaiva prakāśata ityanumantavyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4405: na cātyantaluptakāryaṃ vastu tatkāryajananaśaktamityatra kiñcitpramāṇaṃ kramate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4409: api ca bodhe satyevātmano 'nātmavyavacchede saṃbhavati kṛtaṃ tacchaktayāśrayaṇena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4410: na caivaṃ sati bodha eva paramātmeti yuktam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4414: naca citimātrātmavāde 'pi tasyāgantukaviṣayasaṃbandhe bodhatvamadhyāropya boddhṛtvasamarthanaṃ sādhīyaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4426: ghaṭādayo hi prasiddhamṛddaṇḍacakrabhramaṇādiparyāptanimittāntara śālino na citimapi nijajanane 'pekṣante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4436: na hi sadā saṃnihitasamagrakāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ kadācidbhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4441: tathāhi-arthāntaragatatve sati janakadravyāntara prati kāryatvādikena rūpeṇāsādhāraṇo
GSP33yaatsi_u:4443: tādṛśī cārthasiddhiryaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyasādhāraṇī tatsamavetatādṛśakriyājanyeti śakyamanumātum /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4453: satyapi tasminnartho na prakāśata iti cet,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4454: svatvaṃ vā kiṃ yathoditaṃ sati jīvane jāyata eva ? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4457: ato yaṃ pratyasādhāraṇo yathoditadharmaḥ tadīyāsādhāraṇadharmanimitta ityetāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4462: asti hi tatrāpīmaṃ deśamādityaḥ prakāśayati prācīkaśat prakāśayiṣyatīti pratītiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4479: syādetat-yathaiva khlvasvabhāvabhūtenāpi śarīreṇa sadhrīcīna evāyaṃ cetanaścakāsti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4483: yogināṃ praṇihitamanasāmuparatabahirindriyāṇāṃ ca dehānusandhānaviraheṇāpi ahamiti sphuṭamanubhavāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4484: jānāmīti pratyayaḥ śarīravarṇasanniveśanirbhāsaśūnyatayā tattvāntaragocara iti ca prāgevāvocam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4485: karmānuguṇyena suramanujādijātīyatayā bhidyamānāsvāgamāpāyinīṣu tanuṣu manasa ivaikasya varṣmaṇaḥ svabhāvānubandhitvenāśrayitumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4488: bodhasvābhāvye puṃsaḥ svāpamūrcchayoḥ prakāśaprasaṅga iti cenna,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4490: tathāhi-prakāśa iti padārthamātrasādhāraṇaṃ bodhajanyaṃ prakaṭatādipadaparyāyaṃ dharmamabhipretya vāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4497: bodhasvābhāvye hi puruṣasya svāpādidaśāsu ca tathābhāvo 'bhimata eveti na hi tadāpādanaṃ doṣāya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4498: atha matam-svāpādāvapi svānubhavasadbhāve jāgara iva vyavahāraprasaṅga iti; maivam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4508: yadyucyeta-mūrcchādāvātmānubhavābhyupagamer'thāntarānubhava ivaivamahamanvabhūvamiti parastāt smṛtiḥ prasajyata iti; tanna,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4510: na hi mūrcchā prasvāpo vā buddhivṛttiviśeṣo darśanasparśanādivat, yena
GSP33yaatsi_u:4520: ya evāhaṃ pūrvedyurāsaṃ sa evāhamadyāpīti smṛtisaṃbhinnapratyayo 'pi kālāvacchinnasvarūpagocaraḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4523: paṭīyasā savikalpakenāvagamena smṛtibījamādhīyata iti ca kutastatprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4528: asaṃprajñātasamādhāvapi paramavairāgyaśālinā paṭutaranirodhasaṃskāreṇa caritādhikāriṇā apavargiṇā viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4530: kathaṃ punarnidrāyā avṛttitve prabuddhasya pratyavamarśāḥ sukhamahamasvāpsamityādyāḥ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:4537: sattvarajasī tvabhibhūya nitāntamudbhūte tamasi gāḍhamūḍhaṃ supto 'smi,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4551: kathaṃ tarhi pāramarṣaṃ sūtram “abhāvapratyayālambanā vṛttirnidrā ” iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4563: āha-bodhakāraṇānuvṛttyāpi bodhānuvṛttirupapadyata iti kathaṃ tathāsvābhāvyaniścayaḥ? ittham -
GSP33yaatsi_u:4567: na svataḥ iti pratyavasthānaprasaṅge jñānasya nityatvaṃ tāvadvyavasthāpayati atrāhu riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4570: ātmasvarūpanirūpakadharmatvācca jñānasya na jñānarahitamātmanaḥ svarūpaṃ vyavatiṣṭeta prakāśarahitamiva tejaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4573: nanu jñānābhāve 'pi jñānaśaktimadātmasvarūpaṃ muktikāla ityatrāha citiśaktaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4578: muktau kadāpi jñānasyānudayāttacchaktirapi tadā naṣṭaiveti ātmanāśa eva pratijñāto bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4581: kintu āgantukamapi tadātmana eveṣyate dharmabhūtaṃ na ghaṭāderityātmanātmavyavasthopapadyata iti cet;
GSP33yaatsi_u:4585: pāṣāṇakalpasya muktātmano 'cidvyāvartakacicchaktayāśrayaṇaṃ vyarthamityāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4587: nanu nityatve jñānasyā'tmatvamapīṣyatāṃ tasyaiveti śaṅkāmanūdya pariharati na caivaṃ satī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4593: ahaṃ jānāmīti jñātrātmapratyakṣasya bhramatvamiti cettatrāha anubhave ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4599: ato boddhṛtvapratipattirātmana upapadyata iti śaṅkate na ca citimātre ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4600: viṣayacaitanyasaṃbandhasya bodhatvābhimatasya saṃyogarūpatve tasya dviṣṭhatvādviṣayasyāpi boddhṛtvaprasaṅga ityāha sambandhasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4602: yathā kāryakāraṇabhāvasya hetuhetumadubhayanirūpyatve 'pi hetuhetumatorvyavasthā idamasya kāraṇam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4604: evaṃ cidviṣayasaṃbandhasya viṣayaviṣayinirūpyatve 'pi boddhṛbodhyavyavasthā ghaṭata iti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4606: yadyapi kāryasya kāraṇasya ca saṃbandhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kathyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4607: paraṃ tu kāryatvaṃ kāraṇanirūpitaṃ kāryaniṣṭhaṃ svapūrvavartikāraṇāpekṣatvalakṣaṇaṃ svaprākkālāvacchedena kāryavyāpakakāraṇakatvaparyasāyi,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4608: kāraṇatvaṃ ca kāryanirūpitaṃ kāraṇaniṣṭhaṃ svottarabhāvikāryāpekṣatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaniyataprākkālavartitvaparyavasāyi bhinnabhinnameva tatra praviṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4609: atra tu eka evobhayasamavetaḥ saṃyoga iti vyavasthādurghaṭetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4610: yadyapi saṃyogasyobhayaniṣṭhatve 'pi anuyogitāsaṃbandhena tasya cinniṣṭhatvāccita eva boddhṛtvam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4614: ciccetyayorapi parasparāpekṣāniyamalakṣaṇā eva saṃbandho 'stviti śaṅkate ihāpī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4618: nanvarthānāṃ vāsanādoṣāccaitanya eva kalpitatvādadhiṣṭhānatayā cito 'pekṣā syādevetyatrā'ha nirastaśce
GSP33yaatsi_u:4635: tadāśraya ātmeti na bodhamātramātmeti sāmpratamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4636: nanvevamātmano bodhasvarūpatvavadbodhasvabhāvatvamapi na saṃbhavati anityasya bodhasya nityātmasvabhāvatvāyogāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4637: arthiprakāśakādācitkatvāya bodhakādācitkatāyā eva mantavyatvāditi śaṅkate nanvevam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4638: jñānasya kriyātvamāgantukatvaṃ ca sādhayituṃ sāmānyavyāptiṃ śikṣayati arthāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4642: ubhayaniṣṭho 'pyayaṃ puruṣapravṛttimūlatvena puruṣāsādhāraṇaḥ puruṣaniṣṭhāgantukagamanakriyājanyo dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4650: kulaparamparayā prāpte kṣetrādau janmata eva svatvaṃ yasya bhāgino 'nyasyābhāvāt,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4652: tatra tadasādhāraṇer'thāntarakṣetrādisvatve tanniṣṭhakriyājanyatvaṃ nāstīti vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4653: abhāvaprāptetyatra bhāvaprāpteti svabhāvaprāpteti vānyathā vā pāṭhaḥ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4654: anyakriyayā daivena vā svakṣetre patitānāṃ bījānāṃ prarūḍhānāṃ svatve svāsādhāraṇe svīyāgantukakriyājanyatvaṃ nāstīti vyabhicāramapi pradarśayati kṣetriṇam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4657: tathā kṣetriṇaḥ sattva eva tannirūpitaṃ kṣetrādisvatvaṃ sidhyatīti tatra tata eva nirvyāpārasyāpi kṣetriṇo janakatvaṃ setsyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4659: kintu jīvanameva vyāpāra iti śaṅkate tajjīvanameve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4666: nāto vyabhicāra iti cettarhyarthāntaramityāha api caivam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4672: jīvanasyāpyuttarottarakālasattālakṣaṇasya na kriyārūpatvamiti na tadvyāpārajanyatvamapi sādhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4677: asmadaniṣṭaṃ sādhayituṃ pravṛttasya bhavator'thāntareṇa nigrahaṇamevāsmākaṃ lābha iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33yaatsi_u:4678: svabhāvaprāptakṣetrādisvatve vyabhicārādevāgantukadharmajanyatvamapi na sādhayituṃ śakyata iti cānusandheyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4680: prakārāntareṇa ca tatsādhanaṃ dūṣayitumanuvadati na ca hetubhede ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4689: viśiṣṭe vidhiniṣedhau viśeṣaṇamupasaṅkāmataḥ sati viśeṣye bādhe iti nyāyena viśiṣṭe kālāvacchedapratītirviśeṣaṇe paryavasyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4692: tathā ca yadrūpāvacchinnasya kālāvacchedapratītiḥ tasyānityatvameva svarūpamātrasya ca na kālāvacchedapratītiriti na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4693: svarūpamātrasya kālāvacchedapratītiḥ pakṣe 'pyasiddheti pariharati ihāpī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4695: avacchinattikālāvacchinnatvaṃ yathā bhavettathā svasaṃbandhena viśinaṣṭi caitanyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4700: jñāne tasyaupādhikatvaniścaya ekāntataḥ kuta iti punaḥ śaṅkate kathaṃ puna riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4708: tenātmanaḥ svarūpata eva prakāśamānasya svāpe jñānavattvenāprakāśe 'pi na kṣatiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4712: ahaṃ dviṣyāmītyātmanaḥ sākṣātkāre jñānavattvenāprakāśādasiddhatvaṃ hetoriti vācyam;
GSP33yaatsi_u:4715: icchādipratyakṣakāle jñānasya svayaṃprakāśatvādicchādyanubhavavattvenāpyātmano bhānācca jñānavattvenaivātmana upalambhaḥ setsyatīti cānusandheyam
GSP33yaatsi_u:4732: yogipratyakṣe ātmacintane ca dehaṃ vinā'tmabhānamuktvā laukikapratyakṣe 'pi tadāha jānāmī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4736: mano yathānuvartate na tathā śarīramekamiti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4739: tasya ca nātmasvabhāvatvamiti tatra vyabhicāra iti mandāśaṅkāmapanudati liṅgasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4740: apinānuvṛttireva nāsti pralaye mokṣe ceti vyajyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4745: ato viśiṣṭaviśeṣeṇānityatvaṃ svarūpato nityatvaṃ ca vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyātreti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4746: atha nityatve jñānasya caturdhā'kṣepamupakṣipya pratikṣipati bodhasvābhāvya ityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4747: jñānasvabhāvatve puṃsaḥ svāpamūrcchayoḥ svarūpaprakāśaḥ syāditi prathamākṣepaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4749: jñānātiriktasya jñānajanyasya prakāśasya sattve 'pi ātmani bodhena tasyājananaṃ svāpe tamoguṇapratibandhādgāḍhāndhakārapratibandhādiva cākṣuṣasyājananamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4752: bodhasya sattve svāpa ātmano vyavahāraprasaṅga iti dvitīyākṣepaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4756: ādyo na sambhavatītyāha kaḥ khalvi ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4763: tatsattve 'pi na tadviṣayasya vyāharaṇaṃ dṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4764: tathāca svaviṣayavyāhāravyāptirjñānasya nāstītyasthāne prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4765: anubhave sati svāpa ātmano jāgaraṇe smṛtiprasaṅga iti tṛtīyākṣepaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4778: na tu jñānasya vṛttaya iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33yaatsi_u:4784: yadvā bodha eva svo bhāvaḥ svarūpam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4785: tattvāccidrūpatvādevāsya-ātmanaḥ svaviṣayakasaṃskārajanakatvaṃ kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4791: nityabodhasvarūpasya saṃskārajanakatvedoṣamuktvā niṣprayojanatvamapyāha anubhave ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4793: nityānubhava eva jāgrati kaḥ saṃskārakalpanāyā artha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4799: ātmasvarūpamātrasya sadā prakāśe 'pi tattatkālādyavacchinnasya vṛttigrāhyatayā vṛtteśca saṃskārajanakatayā nirukta pratyaya upapadyata ityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4801: nityātmabodhasya saṃskārajanakatve bādhakaṃ prayojanābhāvaṃ cābhidhāya tasya svāpādikālikasya saṃskārajanakatvāsaṃbhavamapyabhidhatte aviśadaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4807: atredaṃ bodhyam- yadyapi suptotthitasya sukhamahamasvāpsa mityādipratisandhānabalātsvāpakālikātmasvarūpānubhavasyāpi saṃskārajanakatvameṣṭavyam
GSP33yaatsi_u:4809: ata evāgre astu vā ityādinā pakṣāntaraṃ vakṣyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4810: anubhave vartamāne tāvanmātraviṣayakasmṛterudayāyoge 'pi pratyavamarśasyādhikaviṣayasya saṃskārabalādudaye na kṣatiriti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4816: yathā jāgare sadānubhūyamānasyāpi karacaraṇādilakṣaṇasya śarīrasyāgantukaviśeṣasphuraṇavelāyāmeva viśeṣataḥ pratipattyānyadānanubhūyamānateva,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4817: yathā vā'ntarasya jāgaraṇe śarīradhāraṇaprayatnasya sadānuvartamānasyāpi buddhipūrvahastādyutkṣepaṇakāla eva sphuṭāvabhāsenānyadānanubhūyamānateva,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4826: svāpe 'pi bodhānuvṛttau samādhimuktayoḥ svāpāviśeṣaprasaṅga ityākṣepāntaramanūdya pariharati na cāvikṛte ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4834: samādhau ca puṃsaḥ paramavairāgyanirodhasaṃskārapāṭavātmaikapravaṇamanaskatvaprayuktamokṣopāyasiddhikṛtaḥ svāpato mahān viśeṣo 'stīti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4843: atha svāpe 'pi anutyayā vṛttyaivātmanaḥ prakāśaḥ setsyati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4844: kṛtaṃ svaprakāśatvenetyantarnidhāya svāpe 'pi buddhivṛttireṣṭavyeti śaṅkate kathaṃ puna riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4850: svāpe tama anubhave satyeva tajjasaṃskārataḥ prabodhe sukhamasvāpsamityādipratisandhānasyopapattiḥ nānyatheti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4865: nidrāyā vṛttirūpatvābhāve pātañjalasūtrasya kā gatiriti śaṅkate kathaṃ tarhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4870: anyathākhyāterabhāvena bhedāgrahasyaiva bhramasthalābhiṣiktasya viparyayaśabditasya niroddhavyatvatātparyeṇa vṛttitvavannidrāyā api vṛttitvaṃ kīrtyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4876: sukhamahamasvāpsamiti pratīteḥ pratisandhānarūpatvamupagamyāpyāha astu ve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4878: niruktarītyā svāpe 'pi bodhānuvṛttipratipādanācca tadeva pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti nāsmākaṃ kācit kṣatiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4879: yatti hṛdayaṃ vṛttyaivātmanaḥ prakāśo na svarūpata iti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4880: tattvāśāmodakāyitamiti ca pūrvottarābhyāṃ sunirūpitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4884: uparatāni hi prasvāpakāle sarvāṇyevendriyāṇi saha manasā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4888: kḷptaśca sarvārthasādhanatayā bodha iti tenaiva karaṇavirahiṇā satā svabhāvabhūteno(dbhūteno)
GSP33yaatsi_u:4893: vṛtteḥ karaṇajanyatvāditi parasya śaṅkāmanuvadati āhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4897: svāpe kāraṇāyogātsvataḥsiddha eva tamaḥprakāśako bodha ityeṣṭavyamityarthaḥ //27//
GSP33yaatsi_u:4902: iti balādeṣṭavyaṃ yadi tamo 'nubhavaḥ svāpa iṣyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4905: svarūpānubhavabalātsukhatvena tadā bhāsamānasyātmanaḥ parāmarśaḥ paraṃ prabodha iti tu siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4907: nityānubhavasya saṃskārājanakatve tu sākṣādeva svāpakālīnātmasvarūpānubhavasya niruktapratisandhānahetutvaṃ sukhatvenātmāgāhanāṃśa iti ca bodhyam
GSP33yaatsi_u:4908: bodhasvabhāvasyāpyātmano vṛttikāla evāstu prakāśo na sarvadetyatra tāvannityaprakāśatvaṃ sādhayati nityaprakāśaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4920: tato hetvabhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptimupadarśayituṃ nidarśanatayā ghaṭādyupādātavyam-yadanityaprakāśamanyādhīnaprakāśaṃ vā tadapramātṛ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4922: tatra ca viśeṣaniṣedhasya sāmānyābhyanujñākṣepakatvādāgantukaṃ jñānaṃ ghaṭādāvanumatamāpadyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4923: atha tanmābhūditi viṣayaviṣayibhāva eva saṃbandhaḥ saṃgīyeta,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4927: acetanagocara eva tathā niyama iti cenna,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4929: na cānātmagocara eva sādhanasāpekṣatvaniyama iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4942: sa ca yathoditasādhanabalādeva sāṃsiddhiko nityaścātmana iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4947: jñeyasya jñātuḥ svātmanaśca vyavahārānuguṇaṃ jñānamudayata iti yuktaḥ triṣvapi ekarūpaḥ prakāśatevyavahāraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4948: tattvāntaraprakāśābhyupagametātsvābhāvye jhr na ṭa ca punaḥ kiṃ caitanyāśrayaṇena? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4949: na ca prakāśa eva taditi vācyam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4955: atha saṃvidastatsaṃbandhādhīnaḥ sa dharma iti cet;
GSP33yaatsi_u:4965: tayā cānumeyaṃ jñānamiti pakṣaḥ prāgeva pratikṣiptaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4967: ātmani samavetaṃ jñānamasaṃbandhinyarthe prakāśaṃ vyavahāraṃ vā kathaṃ prasuvītetyapi cintyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4969: na khalu labdhātmakaṃ kāryaṃ svanimittakāraṇamanurudhya kāryamārabhate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4973: ata indriyeṇa saha caitanyamapi nissṛtya tena tenārthena sannikṛṣyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4975: tathā sati hi tadupādhikatvāttajjñānasya yuktaṃ tadbhāvānuvidhāyitvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4981: nanu nityaprakāśatvaṃ svābhāvikabodhakṛtameva kiṃ na syādityatrāha svataḥsiddhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4985: jñānasya prakāśo jñānāntarānapekṣo 'pyātmasambandhāpekṣa iti jñāne 'nanyādhīnaprakāśatvalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ nāsti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4986: tena sapakṣe jñāne sati pakṣamātravṛtti jñātṛtvaṃ bhavatyasādhāraṇamiti śaṅkānavakāśaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4992: atha prasaṅgāt prakāśa padārthaṃ nirṇetuṃ vimarśamupakṣipati kaḥ puna riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5000: na caivaṃ sati tatra hetvabhāvo 'jñātṛtvaṃ na syāditi vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5002: prakāśāśrayatvamātrasya tu sādhanāyogaḥ siddhatvāditi ca bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5003: uktadoṣaparihārāya prakārāntaraṃ śaṅkate atha tanmābhū diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5016: svātmabhinnaviṣaya eva viṣayīkārasya karaṇāpekṣatvamucyata iti na ca vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5018: svātmaprakāśane 'pi śabdaliṅgādikaraṇasāpekṣatvadarśanāt niyamasaṅkoco na karaṇīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5020: asya cātmaviṣayīkaraṇe na karaṇāpekṣetyatrāha viruddhe iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5022: svarūpamātrajñāne ākārabhedādavirodhasamarthanamapi na sambhavatītyāha nityatve tyādivākyadvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5023: nanu svarūpasyaiva gamyatvepi tasyaiva gamakatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣadharmabhedāddhaṭetetyatrāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:5027: evaṃ grāhyagrāhakatāvacchedakadharmabhede pakṣīkṛtasyāpi ātmano na svaprakāśatvaṃ sidhyedityarthaḥ/
GSP33yaatsi_u:5032: prakāśata iti pratītivyavahārau ca prākaṭyāśrayatvārthakāveva prācuryeṇa pravartete /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5034: sa eva nityaḥ svābhāvikaścātmanaḥ sādhyatāṃ jñātṛtvabalāditi śaṅkāgranthārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5036: jñātatāvyavahārasya svaprakāśajñānata evopapatterna jñānajanye jñātatākhye dharmāntare pramāṇaṃ kimapīti parākaraṇaprakāraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5039: tadadhīnavyavahārānuguṇyaṃ sambandhaḥ prakāśata ityatrākhyātārtha iti pakṣa eva jñeyajñānajñātṛṣu ekārthakatā prakāśatevyavahārasya ghaṭata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5041: jñānātiriktasya prakāśasya nityasyātmanyupagame tatra jñānaṃ vyarthamiti cāha tattvāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5042: svaviṣayakajñāne satyevātmanaḥ prakāśamānateti kṣemasādhāraṇaprayojakatopagamānnātmani caitanyasya vaiyarthyamiti śaṅkate yadyucyete ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5046: tathā ca caitanyasamavāyitvasya prakāśamānatāprayojakatve caitanye tadabhāvātprakāśamānatā na ghaṭeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5047: nanu caitanyasambandha eva prakāśaheturupeyata iti cettatrāha kastaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5059: jñānasya tvatīndriyasya jñātatāliṅgakānumānātprākaṭyaṃ sambhavati prakāśatevyavahāranidānamityatrāha jñānādhīne ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5064: cātmani prakāśatevyavahāra iti triṣvapi tasyaikarūpyāsambhava etanmata iti sthitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5066: procya gurumate 'pi triṣu vyavahārānuguṇye aikarūpyāsambhavaṃ vimarśaka udbhāvayati svaprakāśe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5069: jñānāśrayatayā cātmani vyavahārānuguṇyaṃ vaktavyamiti gurumate 'pi vairūpyamaśakyaparihāramityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5073: tat tasminnarthe prakaṭatāṃ vyavahārānuguṇyaṃ vā niṣpādayatīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5079: jñānasyaiva svakāryaniṣpādane svanimittāpekṣetyāśrayaṇe cedamapi vaiṣamyaṃ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5082: anyatra nimittanāśe kāryanāśasyādarśanāt jñānasyaiva nimittanāśena nāśābhyupagamenāpi vaiṣamyaṃ prasaktaṃ pakṣadvaye 'pītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5083: kaṃ tarhi prakāśasya vyavahārasya vopapattiḥ? tatrāti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5084: iti indriyādidvārā prasṛtasya tena sahārthasannikṛṣṭasya jñānasyārthaprakāśakasyārthapkāvyavahāra- janakatvaṃ svīkāryamanāyatyeti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5087: indriyeṇa saha pravṛttyādimattve hi jñānasya tadarthasannikṛṣṭasya tatprakāśakasyendriyārthasannikarṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyanvayavyat irekopapattirityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:5104: paṭa eka iti sarvadravyasādhāraṇyamekatvasya na syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5105: nahi ghaṭasvarūpasya paṭasvarūpeṇa saṃbhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5109: tathā prakṛte 'pi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkate na ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5111: apekṣābuddhināśena dvitvādināśasyāsiddhatvena na nimittanāśena kāryanāśe dvitvādernāśasya nidarśanatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5116: dṛṣṭānte hetvāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate nanu naikatvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5133: dṛṣṭānte hetvasiddhiṃ śaṅkate ' nanu naikatva 'm iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5141: svarūpatve bādhakamuktvaikatvasya saṅkhyātve sādhakamapyāha ' saṅkhyakate ' ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5144: atredaṃ bodhyam-uddeśyatāvacchedakāvacchinnaparyāpterdvitvādisaṃbandhatayā bhānāt ekatvāvacchinnaparyāpteśca dvitvādisaṃbandhatvābhāvena na ekaṃ dvāviti prayogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5153: anyacca, arthasya prakāśakaṃ hi jñānaṃ bhavatām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5154: sarvaṃ ca prakāśakaṃ prakāśyavastusannikṛṣṭameva prakāśakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dīpaprabhādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5163: kvācitkatve tu tadvi yadaikadaikendriyeṇa saṃprayuktaṃ tadarthābhimukham,
GSP33yaatsi_u:5172: sa khalu śaṅkhamukhāderdavīyaso 'pi deśāt nodanaviśeṣeṇa loṣṭādiriva yāvadvegaṃ pratiṣṭhate sparśavihīno 'pi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5180: api cātītatayānāgatatayā ca tāvapyadyāpi vidyete iti tena rūpeṇa bodhasannikarṣe kānupapattiḥ ?

GSP33yaatsi_u:5732: yathā ālokārthasaṃyogasyaiva prakāśatve 'pi prakāśakatvaṃ svadharmabhūtālokaprasaraṇavaśātsūryādereva nārthasya tadvaditi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5735: evaṃ prathamaṃ pakṣamupapādya tattadarthasaṃbaddhaṃ caitanyameva tattadarthajñānamiti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ śaṅkāsamādhānamukhena vyavasthāpayati atheti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5738: tattadarthasaṃbaddhālokāśrayasyaiva sūryādeḥ prakāśakatvamiva tattadarthasaṃbaddhacaitanyavata ātmana eva jñātṛtvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5741: ananyasādhana ityuktamananyādhīnasiddhitvaṃ caitanyasvabhāvatvaṃ cātmano nigamayati tatsiddhamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5756: anumānāgamānāṃ parokṣaikahetutvena prasphuṭaprakāśāsampādakatvāttāvanmātre 'paritoṣaḥ prasphuṭātmaprakāśākāṅkṣiṇāṃ yukta eva hi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5757: mana ādigatajñānāvāraṇadoṣakṣapaṇaṃ yogāṅgānuṣṭhānena sampadyata iti yamaniyameti dyotitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5771: tatra sugatamatānusāriṇaḥ sanmātrānubandhinīṃ kṣaṇikatāmācakṣāṇā nityātmadarśanameva sarvānarthamūlaṃ manyamānāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginamenaṃ saṅgirante;
GSP33yaatsi_u:5778: na tasya sadbhāvaḥ saṃbhāvyata ityarthakriyākāritaiva sattā bhāvānām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5779: na ca sā svavyāpakabhūtakramayaugapadyavirahiṇyakṣaṇike saṃbhavinītyanyatra niravakāśatayā kṣaṇikatayaivānubadhyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5783: svaprakāśasyātmano dharmabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayādigrahaṇe dehādivailakṣaṇyagrahaṇe cātmana upayujyata ityetāvatā siddham /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5790: ātmanaḥ kālasaṃbandhe vicāraviṣaye kṣaṇamātrakālasaṃbandhinaṃ vināśinamātmānamāmananti kecana vādinaḥ (saugatāḥ) iti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5801: taccākṣaṇike sthire 'ghaṭamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ kṣaṇike vyavaśtāpayatīti sattva kṣaṇikatvavyāpyamevetyāpatatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5807: bhāvābhāvavadanayoranyataranivṛttāvanyataravyavasthānādarthakriyājanane bhāvānāṃ na tṛtīyaprakārasaṃbhava iti kramākramapratibaddhaivārthakriyā / na cākṣa
GSP33yaatsi_u:5815: tadabhāve ca yaugapadyaṃ niyatamiti kramayaugapadyānyataravyāpyaivārthakriyā bhavatītyarthaḥ //44/
